When you activate the fulu, you gain a +2 status bonus on the triggering Fortitude save and on Fortitude saves against the same poison for the next minute. If the triggering poison was normal @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UMAXLDpI6YLSfYX1]{Alcohol}, you instead automatically succeed at the triggering save and gain a +4 status bonus on saves against alcohol for 1 minute.

Fulu of the Stoic Ox.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a Fortitude save against a disease.

The ox on this fulu rests vigilantly on the point of the armor right over the bearer's heart, protecting the bearer against diseases and safeguarding their health. When you activate the fulu, you gain a +2 status bonus on the triggering Fortitude save and on all Fortitude saves against the same disease for the next minute.

Fungal Armor.description:
This +2 greater resilient @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ewQZ0VeL38v3qFnN]{Studded Leather Armor} is made of hardened fungus. Every day the armor grows dozens of unusual mushrooms that can be used for cooking, infused reagents, or common spell material components.

Activate r or a Envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You are hit by a melee, ranged, or spell attack

Effect The attack misses you, dealing no damage as you transform into a cloud of spores. You gain the benefits of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form} spell for 1 minute.

For the duration, a cloud of deadly spores surrounds you. Each breathing creature that begins its turn within 10 feet of you takes [[/r 6d8[poison]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|basic|name:Fungal Armor Spores]).

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the cloud form.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Cloudkill} and gaseous form.

Gadget Skates.description:
Activate 1 Interact (move)

Gadget skates are metal devices that come in pairs and strap onto existing footwear (or a creature's feet).

When you Activate gadget skates, clockwork gears reveal small wheels that propel you along the ground, moving you up to twice your Speed. During this movement, you must succeed at a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:20|name:Control] check to turn up to 90 degrees, and you can't turn more than once or more than 90 degrees. During the activation and after the activation is complete, you can't Stride, Step, or otherwise move on the ground until the end of your next turn. However, you can use this movement instead of a Stride to perform a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} just after the activation ends, in the direction of your last movement using the gadget skates.

You can Sustain the Activation of your gadget skates for up to 1 minute. Starting on the turn after you Activate the gadget skates, the first time you Sustain the Activation each turn, you gain the effects of the activation again: you move up to twice your Speed in the same direction as your last movement with the gadget skates, and the restrictions continue to apply until you choose to cease Sustaining the Activation or you reach the maximum duration. Once the effect ends, the skates fall away and you can move normally.

Gaff.name: Gaff
Gaff.description: Muitos gigantes do pântano lugam com imensas gaffs—varas de madeira com um gancho de metal afixado na ponta. Normalmente usado por pescadores paras puxar peixes, gigantes do pântano usam suas gaffs como armas.

Gallows Tooth.name: Dente de Força
Gallows Tooth.description:
Este molar macabro fica pendurado em um barbante através de um buraco minúsculo logo acima de sua raiz seca e exposta. Quando você ativar este talismã, a criatura sendo atacada fica Desprevenida até o final do turno atual.

AtivaçãoF Interagir; Acionamento Você ataca uma criatura adjacente mas ainda não rolou o ataque; Requerimentos Você é mestre em Intimidação.

Galvanic Mortal Coil.description:
This porous steel coil wraps around a shard of onyx, supplementing the closely guarded science of galvaspheres with the magic of necromancy. When embedded in a body comprised of flesh, the blood and other fluids catalyze electrical pulses within the coil, activating the necromantic energies. In living creatures, this causes a dangerous surge that can damage the heart. In corpses, however, this can create a limited window of reanimation, with access to the corpse's final memories. Galvanic mortal coils are even rarer than other galvaspheres, and thought by most to be merely hypothetical.

Activate d Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You drive the coil into a living creature that has 0 HP while attaching the other end to yourself, in order to damage their heart and possibly siphon their life force. The galvanic mortal coil casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dLdRqT6UxTKlsPgp]{Death Knell} on the creature @Check[type:will|dc:27].

Activate (10 minutes) Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You implant the coil into a corpse. The coil casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{Talking Corpse} on the body.

Galvasphere.description:
Activate D Interact

A galvasphere animates a corpse to motion via electricity, rather than necromancy. When you Activate the galvasphere by inserting it into an adjacent intact Medium or Small humanoid corpse, the corpse animates as a galvaheart zombie for 1 minute. The galvaheart zombie has the statistics of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.0plBflWwrCWQO2RO]{Zombie Shambler} except that it is a construct instead of an undead, isn't evil, can't be harmed by positive energy, and is the same size as the corpse (Medium or Small). The zombie is your minion and performs the actions you choose when you Command it. If you don't Command it, it takes no action, twitching in place as the electricity that animates it slowly expends itself.

Gamepiece Chariot.description:
This stone figurine of a chariot pulled by two horses was used by Tekritanin adults during strategy game competitions. Sometimes, though, mischievous adolescents snatched pieces like this one for joyriding.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You place the figurine on the ground and roll it forward. As the chariot begins to move, it rapidly expands to the size of a Large heavy chariot pulled by two animated stone war horses. You can board the chariot and drive it up to 80 feet in a straight line. You can move through spaces occupied by creatures of size Medium or smaller, dealing [[/r (4d8+10)[bludgeoning]]] damage to those creatures. Affected creatures must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic] save; on a failure, a creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. The chariot returns to its figurine form once it stops moving.

Garrote Bolt.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The shaft of this silver bolt is engraved with wiry designs.

When a garrote bolt hits a target, it transforms into a silver garrote and wraps around one of the target's appendages, dealing an additional [[/r 2d12[persistent,slashing]]] damage. On a critical hit, it wraps around the target's throat, and the target can't breathe until the persistent damage ends.

Gauntlet.name: Manopla
Gauntlet.description: Armaduras completas, meia armaduras e cotas de talas vêm com um par destas luvas de metal; mas elas também podem ser compradas separadamente e usadas com outros tipos de armadura. Elas não apenas protegem suas mãos como também transformam suas mãos em armas letais

Gearblade.description:
Shaped like a blade made from spinning gears, this +2 greater striking weapon can catch enemy weapons and grind up foes. In order to function, the gearblade must be wound for 10 minutes once every 24 hours. During this process, you can reconfigure the weapon to transform into a bastard sword, greatsword, longsword, or shortsword. It then gains all the features of the chosen weapon except that its Bulk is always 2 and it gains the disarm weapon trait and the versatile B weapon trait (which replaces any other versatile trait the weapon might have). If you don't wind the gearblade, it becomes inert and has the statistics of a greatclub.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Requirements You've wound the gearblade for 10 minutes within the last 24 hours

Trigger You roll a critical success to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} a target with the gearblade

Effect The target's weapon is pulled through the gearblade's gears and shoots out the other side, landing 20 feet away in a direction of your choice. The target must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:36] save. On a failure, the limb holding their weapon is also pulled into the gearblade, and the creature takes [[/r 3d12[bludgeoning]]] damage. On a critical failure, they take [[/r 6d12[bludgeoning]]] damage and the limb becomes unusable until healed by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} spell or a similar effect.

Gecko Pads.description:
Activate 2 Interact

Gecko pads are thin, clockwork devices shaped like palms, which can be strapped onto existing handwear or a creature's hands. When activated, they whir to life and improve your grip on surfaces, while slowly releasing a sticky substance stored within the device's surface to help you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}. The pads give you a climb Speed equal to your Speed for 10 minutes as long as your hands are free.

Gecko Pads (Greater).description:
Activate 2 Interact

Gecko pads are thin, clockwork devices shaped like palms, which can be strapped onto existing handwear or a creature's hands. When activated, they whir to life and improve your grip on surfaces, while slowly releasing a sticky substance stored within the device's surface to help you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}. The pads give you a climb Speed equal to your Speed for 1 hour as long as your hands are free.

Gecko Potion.description:
Activate A Interact

A gecko potion is a sticky, tawny brown liquid with flecks of sand suspended in it. For 5 minutes after drinking this potion, your fingertips sprout thousands of microscopic, bristled hairs that cling to objects.

Benefit You gain a +1 item bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{Palm an Object} checks and to your Reflex DC against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} attempts.

Duration 5 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.buJnkFBzL4e22ASp]{Effect: Gecko Potion}

Genealogy Mask.description:
Access Alijae ethnicity

These large masks are forged of precious metals or carved of wood and tasked with guarding the history of a family. Most Alijae are granted a genealogy mask when they come of age, which they bequeath to their next of kin upon death. When a member of the family recounted in the genealogy mask performs a particularly significant event while wearing the mask, its eyes and ears animate, allowing the item to witness and record the deeds for posterity. Different families have different standards for their genealogy masks-some may value accuracy and objective, clinical facts, while others may relish embellishing their stories to the very brink of believability in the name of a good story.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You ask the mask about the deeds of a particular ancestor, and the mask speaks for 10 minutes, recalling the tales it knows about that ancestor. The mask is limited by what information a particular ancestor shared with it.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dtOUkMC57izf93z5]{Ancestral Memories} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink}. You must be an Alijae elf.

Genius Diadem.name: Diadema do Gênio
Genius Diadem.description:
Percepção +22; visão precisa de 9 metros, audição imprecisa de 9 metros, detecção magia constante; Comunicação fala (Comum, Dracônica, e oito outras línguas comuns) Perícias Arcanismo +34, sete perícias de Saber +28, Ocultismo +28, Sociedade +28 Int +8, Sab +0, Car +4 Von +24

O diadema do gênio é um diadema do intelecto que normalmente age como um professor ou mentor arrogante, muitas vezes se gabando de ser um intelecto superior certificado e muito superior à sua própria inteligência, mesmo depois dos benefícios que o diadema lhe concede. O diadema do gênio o incentiva a aprender coisas por si mesmo, em vez de realmente tentar Recordar Conhecimento para você, embora você ou seus aliados possam ser capazes de jogar com sua arrogância usando Dissimulação para enganá-lo para fazê-lo. Além de permitir que você o ative, o diadema pode usar a ativação da hipercognição diadema do intelecto com suas próprias ações, embora se o fizer, o diadema ganha os benefícios em vez de você. Apenas o diadema pode usar a seguinte ativação.

Ativação D Actions"> comandar, Interagir; Frequência uma vez por hora; Efeito O diadema do gênio conjura enfraquecer mente de 7º nível.

(Tradução não oficial - Gamemastery Guide)

Ghastly Cauldron.description:
This black cooking pot can produce a feast fit for undead.

Activate 3 Interact

Frequency once per day

Requirements The cauldron must be filled with water, herbs, bones, and raw meat, and kept at a boil for 1 hour

Effect As you stir the cauldron, its contents transform into 10 meals suitable for undead consumption. Each meal must be ladled from the cauldron individually as a 3-action activity and must be eaten within 1 hour of removal. An undead creature that consumes a meal from the cauldron regains [[/r 5d8[healing]]]{5d8 Hit Points} and gains the benefits of 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} that you choose; living creatures who consume a meal from the cauldron take [[/r 5d8[negative]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|basic]) instead. Any meals remaining in the cauldron 24 hours after activation become inedible slurry.

Ghost Ammunition.name: Munição Fantasma
Ghost Ammunition.description:
A munição fantasma é fria ao toque. Esta munição tem os benefícios da runa de propriedade toque fantasma e pode voar através de qualquer obstáculo — exceto os que bloqueiam criaturas ou efeitos incorpóreos. Embora a munição penetre barreiras e ignore todas as coberturas, o alvo ainda se beneficia de um teste simples por estar ocultado ou escondido. Você ainda não pode mirar em uma criatura indetectada sem supor a sua localização.

Depois que é lançada, a munição vira névoa. Entretanto, na calada da noite, 1d4 dias depois, ela reaparece na última aljava ou outro compartimento de onde foi tirada.

Ghost Charge (Greater).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

These spring-loaded metal canisters contain a mixture of chemicals and salts that drain and disintegrate nearby undead creatures.

A ghost charge gives a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, deals [[/r 3d8]] positive damage and 3 positive splash damage, though as usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing. A primary target that takes damage from a ghost charge becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the start of your next turn.

Ghost charges are designed to explode even on contact with a spiritual substance, making them ideal for damaging incorporeal undead.

Ghost Charge (Lesser).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

These spring-loaded metal canisters contain a mixture of chemicals and salts that drain and disintegrate nearby undead creatures.

A ghost charge deals [[/r 1d8]] positive damage and 1 positive splash damage, though as usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing. A primary target that takes damage from a ghost charge becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the start of your next turn.

Ghost charges are designed to explode even on contact with a spiritual substance, making them ideal for damaging incorporeal undead.

Ghost Charge (Major).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

These spring-loaded metal canisters contain a mixture of chemicals and salts that drain and disintegrate nearby undead creatures.

A ghost charge gives a +3 item bonus to attack rolls, deals [[/r 4d8]] positive damage and 4 positive splash damage, though as usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing. A primary target that takes damage from a ghost charge becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the start of your next turn.

Ghost charges are designed to explode even on contact with a spiritual substance, making them ideal for damaging incorporeal undead.

Ghost Charge (Moderate).description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

These spring-loaded metal canisters contain a mixture of chemicals and salts that drain and disintegrate nearby undead creatures.

A ghost charge gives a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, deals [[/r 2d8]] positive damage and 2 positive splash damage, though as usual for positive damage, this damage harms only undead and creatures with negative healing. A primary target that takes damage from a ghost charge becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the start of your next turn.

Ghost charges are designed to explode even on contact with a spiritual substance, making them ideal for damaging incorporeal undead.

Ghost Dust.name: Pó de Fantasma
Ghost Dust.description:
Este pequeno frasco contém um pó verde acinzentado processado a partir de ectoplasma seco. Quando ativar o pó, ele conjura @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibilidade} de 4º nível em você. Isto surte efeito antes que você se mova durante a ação acionada.

AtivaçãoF visualizar; Trigger You use an action with the move trait; Requerimentos Você é lendário em Furtividade.

Ghost Ink.description:
Activate 10 minutes (Interact)

This pale-blue ink dries rapidly, becoming fully transparent 1 minute after application. The ink glows red when exposed to heat, such as that from a torch or other open flame. This glow lasts only as long as the ink is exposed to heat, after which the ink becomes invisible again. The crafter of the ghost ink can alter the formula slightly to instead make the ink sensitive to sunlight, starlight, magical light, or heatless light created by an alchemical effect such as a sunrod.

While the text isn't glowing, a creature closely examining a surface marked with ghost ink can detect the presence of the ink with a successful @Check[type:perception|dc:25|traits:action:seek] check. On a critical success, they can make out the ink well enough to use Society to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d9gbpiQjChYDYA2L]{Decipher Writing}. One vial of ghost ink is sufficient to write a page worth of text.

Ghost Oil.description: The vials containing this translucent, unsubstantial oil are always cold to the touch. Applying ghost oil to a melee weapon you're wielding or carrying causes it to become semitransparent and gain the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} rune, but it also makes the weapon unable to harm corporeal creatures. The oil has no effect when applied to another creature's weapon. The effect of the oil lasts for 1 minute.

Ghost Touch.name: Toque Fantasma
Ghost Touch.description: Esta arma pode ferir criaturas sem forma física. Uma arma de toque fantasma é particularmente efetiva contra criaturas incorpóreas, que quase sempre possuem uma fraqueza específica a armas de toque fantasma. Criaturas incorpóreas podem tocar, segurar e empunhar armas de toque fantasma (diferente da maioria dos objetos físicos).;

Ghostbane Fulu.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You successfully Strike an incorporeal creature with the weapon to which the fulu is affixed, but you haven't rolled damage.

This white paper fulu bears red ink and attunes a weapon to the spiritual essence of an incorporeal creature. Upon activation, the weapon gains the benefit of the ghost touch property rune against the triggering incorporeal creature for 1 minute.

Ghostshot Wrapping.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon while hidden or undetected.

This long strip of linen is tightly wound around the barrel of the affixed firearm or the grip of a bow. When activated, the talisman's magic dampens the sound of the triggering shot, rendering it completely silent, and additionally skews the angle of the shot, so it appears to come from a different location and direction than your actual position. You don't become automatically observed to any creatures due to making the triggering Strike.

Ghoul Hide.name: Couro de Carniçal
Ghoul Hide.description:
Costurado a partir de pedaços de pele de carniçal, estegibão de peles +1 concede +1 de bônus de item em jogadas de salvamento contra doenças e paralisia e o deixa imune à paralisia de carniçais. Couro de carniçal com uma runa resiliente aumenta o bônus de item da runa resiliente nas jogadas de salvamento contra doença e paralisia em 1 (máximo +4).

Couro de Carniçal assobia com um ódio sibilante ao toque de um elfo. Quando usada por uma criatura com o traço elfo, a armadura adquire o traço barulhenta.

Giant Centipede Venom.name: Veneno de Centopeia Gigante
Giant Centipede Venom.description:
Veneno de centopeia gigante causa rigidez muscular severa.

Salvamento Fortitude CD 17; Duração Máxima 6 rodadas; Estágio 1 1d6 de dano de veneno e desprevenido (1 rodada); Estágio 2 1d8 de dano de veneno e desprevenido (1 rodada); Estágio 3 1d12 de dano de veneno, desajeitado 1 e desprevenido (1 rodada)

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir

Giant Scorpion Venom.name: Veneno de Escorpião Gigante
Giant Scorpion Venom.description:
Veneno de escorpião é excruciante e seus efeitos são debilitantes.

Salvamento Fortitude CD 22; Duração Máxima 6 rodadas; Estágio 1 1d10 de dano de veneno e enfraquecido 1 (1 rodada); Estágio 2 2d10 de dano de veneno e enfraquecido 1 (1 rodada); Estágio 3 2d10 de dano de veneno e enfraquecido 1 (1 rodada)

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir

Giant Wasp Venom.name: Veneno de Vespa Gigante
Giant Wasp Venom.description:
Veneno de vespa gigante interfere com os movimentos da vítima.

Salvamento Fortitude CD 25; Duração Máxima 6 rodadas; Estágio 1 2d6 de dano de veneno e desajeitado 1 (1 rodada); Estágio 2 3d6 de dano de veneno e desajeitado 1 (1 rodada); Estágio 3 4d6 de dano de veneno e desajeitado 1 (1 rodada)

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir

Gift of the Poisoned Heart.description:
Activate 1 minute (command, Interact)

Those who fail to see the curse view this object as a priceless gift, capable of restoring life to the deceased, but deep in the heart of this diamond lies a single flaw: a fissured occlusion of sickly, tainted red. To activate the diamond, place it on the relatively intact body of a creature that died within the past year. The stone shatters, restoring the recipient to life with the effects of a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect} ritual, except there is no limit to the level of the creature that may be revived.

This gift of life comes with a terrible cost: the recipient believes you-and anyone else who aided in the resurrection- deliberately caused their death and revived them only in furtherance of some nefarious scheme. Having a proxy activate the gift of the poisoned heart is of no use, as the item's magic sniffs out all coconspirators and uses your attempt to avoid the drawback to feed the resurrected creature's paranoia.

No amount of information or persuasion can alleviate this mistrust, as the cursed creature twists the facts endlessly to fit their delusion. Only magic such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} can neutralize this effect, and the subject resists any attempt to alter their beliefs by magic.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: Esta arma de haste consiste de uma longa lâmina de gume único no fim de uma haste de 2,10 metros. Ela é extremamente eficiente em fazer cortes letais à distância.

Glaive of the Artist.name: Glaive do Artista
Glaive of the Artist.description:
Esta glaive +2 sagrada impactante tem longas faixas nas cores do arco-íris afixadas a parte de trás do cabo ao estilo de um simbolo religioso de Shelyn. Enquanto empunha esta glaive, você ganha um bonus de item +2 em testes de Manufatura e Performance.

Ativação A Interagir; Frequência uma vez por rodada; Efeito Você enrola uma das faixas coloridas ao redor do cabo, concedendo a glaive os efeitos de runa chocante, corrosiva, flamejante, frio ou trovejante por 1 rodada, dependendo da cor da faixa que escolher.

Ativação D Actions" /> Interagir; Frequência uma vez por dia; Efeito Você crava a lâmina da glaive no chão, ativando o poder das faixa. (A lâmina consegue penetrar em qualquer superfície não-metálica e quando usada desta forma, não deixa marcas quando é retirada.) Enquanto a glaive estiver enfiada reta no chão, todos os aliados em um raio de 18 metros que puderem visualizar a glaive recebem um bonus de item +2 em testes de Performance.

Glittering Snare.description:
Small flecks of mica, sand, and ground glass are packed into a spring-loaded canister that can be rigged to a trip wire or hidden in a container. The first creature to enter the square or open the container must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save as the area is showered with bright, glittering dust that sticks to skin, fur, and clothing.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.w0LUnfS2whVhDBUF]{Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)}

Failure The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.D7teqZ68L21aZCpd]{Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure)}

Critical Failure As failure, but the penalty is -4. The glitter sticks for 5 minutes or until the creature spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove it. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than undetected, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.GNFNDyx8nfNXrgV6]{Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failure)}

Gloaming Arc.description:
This black +2 striking scimitar reflects light only along its edge, like a thin crescent moon. It grants a +1 item bonus to Stealth while you're holding it, increasing to a +2 item bonus if it has a +3 weapon potency rune.

Activate 3 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect Attempt a melee Strike with the gloaming arc. On a hit, you slice away the target's shadow from its body and it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}. The target doesn't cast a shadow until it is no longer drained.

Critical Failure As failure, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Gloaming Shard.description:
The blade of this +2 striking returning dagger shines the color of twilight, with a triangular lattice design on the hilt. A thin string of darkness connects your shadow to that of the blade, even once it leaves your hand.

Activate 2 Interact (shadow, teleportation)

Frequency once per hour

Effect You make a thrown Strike with the gloaming shard at a target within 60 feet. Whether you hit or miss, rather than returning to you, the blade pulls you down into your own shadow and along the connecting thread. You instantly teleport to a space adjacent to the target of your Strike, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}, and then catch the dagger in your hand.

Gloom Blade.name: Lâmina da Melancolia
Gloom Blade.description:
Preta como carvão, esta lâmina fica mais potente na escuridão. Enquanto estiver sob luz brilhante, ela funciona como uma espada curta +1 e não parece irradiar nenhuma aura mágica para @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detectar Magia} ou magias similares — exceto se essas magias forem de 4º nível ou superior.

Sob luz fraca ou escuridão, a lâmina da melancolia se torna uma espada curta +2 impactante. Sempre que usar uma lâmina da melancolia para atacar uma criatura para a qual você está indetectado, você causa 1d6 de dano de precisão adicional.

Para melhorar as runas fundamentais da lâmina da melancolia comece com a espada curta +1, básica — mas, se a melhorar além daespada curta +2 impactante, as runas também se aplicam em luz fraca ou escuridão.

Glorious Plate.description:
This elegant full plate is embossed with heraldic imagery and never tarnishes or loses its shine. Glorious plate is +2 resilient full plate. In battle, glorious plate sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius, which enemies see as a blinding halo that obscures creatures other than the wearer. When an enemy looks at the wearer, it must attempt a DC 33 Will saving throw. The enemy is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Success The enemy is unaffected. Failure For 1 minute, the wearer’s allies within the glorious plate’s 10-foot radius of light are concealed to the enemy. Allies are concealed only while they remain within the light; if allies enter the light later, they are concealed as well. Critical Failure As failure, except the wearer’s allies are hidden to the enemy instead of concealed.

Activate D Actions"> command, Interact; Effect The armor casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8xRzLhwGL7Dgy3EZ]{Sanctuary} on you.

Gloves of Carelessness.description: These gloves appear and function as gloves of storing but repel any item not stored in the gloves. When wearing them, whenever you Interact to draw or pick up an item, roll a DC 11 flat check. On a success, you do so as normal. On a failure, you instead fling the item 15 feet in a random direction. You can use a reaction to attempt a DC 23 Reflex save, causing the item to land at your feet instead if you succeed. Removing the stored item from the gloves does not trigger the item’s curse. The first time the curse activates, the gloves fuse to you.

Glue Bullet.description:
Ammunition round

Activate 1 Interact

These cartridges are filled with sticky clear glue. When a glue bullet hits, a syrupy webbing coats the target and sticks to the ground or a nearby surface, hindering their movement. The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for [[/r 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds}, or until it Escapes against a DC of 18. On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes.

Gluttonous Spear.description:
The head of this +1 striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning} spear is wrapped in greasy hide, and its head resembles a thick, clawed finger.

On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute, and you gain [[/r 1d8]] temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute.

Gnome Flickmace.name: Maça-Chicote Gnômica
Gnome Flickmace.description: Mais um mangual do que uma maça, esta arma possui um cabo curto conectado a uma corrente com uma bola em seu fim. A bola é propelida com um movimento do pulso, sendo que o próprio impulso traz a bola de volta para o usuário após o golpe.

Gnome Hooked Hammer.name: Martelo com Gancho Gnômico
Gnome Hooked Hammer.description: Esta ferramenta e arma gnômica ostenta um martelo em uma ponta e uma picareta curva na outra. Ela é uma arma tão estranha e desengonçada que os outros acham que os gnomos são ligeiramente loucos por usá-la.

Goblin-Eye Orb.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a Strike with the affixed firearm or crossbow against an enemy that's concealed or hidden to you.

Requirements You're an expert with the affixed firearm or crossbow and an expert in Perception.

This colorful marble dangles from a leather thong wrapped around the affixed weapon. When you activate the band, for the triggering Strike, you don't need to attempt a flat check due to the enemy being concealed or hidden to you.

Godsbreath Bow.description:
This +2 greater striking composite shortbow is made from wood, horn, and sinew. Once wielded by Ninshaburian heretics, it's carried in a leather case etched with images of Namzaruum in combat with Somnalu. On a successful Strike, it deals an additional [[/r 1d6[bludgeoning]]] damage.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You make a ranged Strike. On a hit, a vortex of air trails the arrow as it travels. When the arrow strikes its target, the vortex expands to a @Template[type:burst|distance:30]{30-foot radius} from its point of impact. The arrow deals an additional [[/r 1d8[bludgeoning]]] damage against its target. For the next 3 minutes, any physical ranged attacks that would strike a target within the vortex deal an additional [[/r 1d8[bludgeoning]]] damage. The vortex is difficult terrain, and creatures attempting to fly through the vortex using a move action must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|traits:evocation,magical|showDC:owner] save, losing its move action on a failed save. Any gases within the vortex are cleared by the winds.

Gold and aquamarine diadem.name: Diadema de de Ouro e Água-Marinha

Gold chalice with black pearls.name: Cálice de Ouro com Pérolas Negras

Gold mask of a high priest.name: Máscara de um Sumo-Sacerdote de Ouro

Gold urn with scenes of judgment.name: Urna de Ouro com cenas de um Julgamento

Golden Blade of Mzali.description:
Each of these golden spears was forged in the days of old Mzali, when the sun kings ruled the city. The majority of these weapons are lost, most likely buried with warriors in tombs and temples sealed by Walkena's decrees. Walkena retains a single golden blade, which he grants to his Master of Spears.

This +2 greater striking returning spear is coated in brilliant gold, and beautiful engravings run along the shaft, depicting the rising and setting of the sun against Mzali's skyline. The spear glows with the effects of 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}. You can suppress or resume this light by using an action, which has the concentrate trait. When you hit a creature with the spear, it takes 1d6 additional fire damage. When you critically hit a creature with the spear, the creature takes [[/r 1d8[persistent,fire]]] damage and [[/r 1d8[bleed]]] as its blood boils away. Unlike normal when taking two types of persistent damage, a creature needs only a single successful flat check to remove both the fire and bleed damage.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You critically hit a creature with the weapon

Effect You call upon the spear's light to guide the creature away from violence. The creature must choose one of the following options:

  • The creature surrenders, immediately receiving the critical failure effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze}.
  • The weapon casts 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness} on the creature with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|name:Blindness|traits:incapacitation,necromancy].

Regardless of the choice, the spear loses its ability to glow with light until your next daily preparations.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The spear casts 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form} on you, choosing fire as the form's trait. The spear loses its additional fire damage until your next daily preparations.

Golden Chrysalis.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Threads of iridescent golden silk wrap around the core of this magical sling stone. When you activate and shoot a golden chrysalis, rather than making an attack roll for your Strike, you cause the chrysalis to unwind in midair to reveal a magical butterfly that flies in a @Template[type:line|distance:30], scattering golden scale dust that hangs in the air for 1 minute.

A creature that enters or begins its turn in the dust must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|name:Avoid Golden Chrysalis|showDC:all] or have its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisiblity} negated, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} instead of invisible. This effect applies both if the creature was already invisible and if it benefits from any new invisibility effects before the end of the invisibility negation effect from the golden chrysalis.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's invisibility is negated for 2 rounds.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute and its invisibility is negated for 1 minute.

Golden Goose.description:
This life-sized, hollow, golden goose statuette has an open, fanged mouth and an unsettling aura of hunger. Fiends sometimes present it as a gift to mortals whose greed makes them susceptible to temptation. While the golden goose can be used without malice, those who possess such a thing often find its glittering lure erodes their morals over time.

Activate Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You feed the goose the warm, still-bloody heart of any sapient, non-evil creature who died within the past hour. The golden goose's eyes flare red as it chews the heart into pulp. Once the heart is destroyed, the goose lays a golden egg worth 50 gp, or 100 gp if you murdered the creature for no reason other than to feed the goose.

After 12 such eggs are laid, the next time you activate the golden goose, it transmutes your heart to gold. This effect functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Flesh to Stone}, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save to resist. If you become petrified, you turn to solid, transparent stone. Your heart becomes a golden egg worth 100 gp, which can be retrieved only by shattering your body. Whether or not you turn to stone, the golden goose dissipates with a honk into sulfurous smoke.

Golden Legion Epaulet.name: Dragona da Legião Dourada
Golden Legion Epaulet.description:
Estas cintilantes dragonas douradas são criadas para oficiais dos Cavaleiros da Águia e vestidas como parte do uniforme. Embora possam ser encantadas para fornecer uma variedade de efeitos, a dragona da Legião Dourada é a mais comum entre elas.

Activate A (comandar); Frequência uma vez por dia; Efeito Emita uma ordem como parte do comando. Você e cada aliado a até 18 metros que seguir essa ordem recebe +1 de bônus de estado em rolagens de ataque, rolagens de dano e jogadas de salvamento contra medo até o início do seu próximo turno.

Golden Rod Memento.description:
This coin-sized golden pin depicts a bundle of five trimmed tree branches. Once you've stolen the pin, accepted it from Krampus willingly, or carried it for at least 1 minute, its curse activates. After that happens, the pin fastens itself to your clothing, providing you an insistent empathic admonition not to be naughty and constantly informing Krampus of your location, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{Status}. The pin reappears and reattaches itself within moments if discarded or destroyed. The pin constantly monitors your actions, judging you against a good-aligned champion's code of conduct, plus the following third tenet:

  • You must never knowingly steal or inflict harm with the goal of stealing the victim's wealth.

This tenet doesn't prevent you from looting those you harm primarily in the defense of yourself and others. Whenever you violate this code of conduct, one of the golden branches tarnishes (and utterly egregious violations might tarnish multiple branches). During the winter following the curse activating, the pin transforms based on the number of golden branches remaining.

5 Branches: The pin either transforms into a pile of golden trinkets whose gold piece value equals your level × 25, or it grants you absolution for your misdeeds as a critically successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual for any good-aligned faith. You don't need to perform a special quest; your exemplary behavior over the past year qualifies.

3-4 Branches: The pin either becomes a non-magical golden pin worth 10 gp, or it grants you absolution for your misdeeds as a successful atone ritual for any good-aligned faith.

1-2 Branches: The pin transforms into a leering Krampus face. As long as you wear it, it grants you weakness 5 to bludgeoning damage, and you still can't remove it.

0 Branches: The pin transforms into Krampus, who appears in an adjacent space and knows of your misdeeds while wearing the pin.

Golem Stylus.name: Caneta Golem
Golem Stylus.description:
Esta pequena caneta com ponta de diamante permite que você inscreva um símbolo mágico no corpo de um golem e, possivelmente, ganhe controle sobre ele.

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir; Frequência um por hora; Efeito Você faz uma inscrição rápida em uma criatura golem adjacente de 11º nível ou inferior. O golem deve ter sucesso em uma jogada de salvamento de Reflexos CD 27 ou você imediatamente ganha controle sobre o golem por 1 minuto. Um golem controlado é útil para você e segue suas ordens com o melhor de sua capacidade, desde que esteja sob seu controle. Se o controlador original do golem está dentro de 18 metros do golem e pode ver o golem, aquele controlador pode tentar um teste de neutralizar (CD 27) como uma reação para neutralizar este efeito; com sucesso, a inscrição desaparece e o golem retorna ao seu estado de pré-inscrição. A inscrição também pode ser anulada com @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dissipar Magia}.

Se o golem que você está mirando já foi inscrito com uma caneta golem, você deve tentar um teste de neutralizar contra a inscrição anterior como parte da ativação do item, usando o nível de item da caneta golem ou seu modificador de teste de perícia Arcanismo como seu modificador de teste de neutralizar. Se for bem-sucedido, você modifica a inscrição existente para que o golem fique sob seu controle.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 3)

Gorget of the Primal Roar.name: Gorjeira do Rugido Primal
Gorget of the Primal Roar.description:
Esta gorjeira de madeira negra parece vibrar com ferocidade, concedendo +2 de bônus de item em testes de Intimidação.

Ativação A comandar; Frequência uma vez por duração de cada efeito de polimorfia; Requerimentos Você está em uma forma não-humanoide devido a um efeito de polimorfia; Efeito Você solta um rugido bestial, fazendo um único teste de Intimidação contra a CD de Vontade de todos os inimigos a até 9 metros para impor os efeitos abaixo. Embora esta ativação tenha o componentee comandar, você pode proclamar este comando sem a necessidade de um idioma.

Sucesso Crítico A criatura fica assustada 2. SuccessoA criatura fica assustada 1. Falha A criatura não é afetada..

Gorgon's Breath.name: Hálito de Górgona
Gorgon's Breath.description:
O hálito de Górgona é um pó fino que pode facilmente entrar na corrente sanguínea de criaturas vivas através de seus pulmões antes de se ligar às membranas mucosas e causar o endurecimento de todos os tecidos moles próximos.

Salvamento CD 32 Fortitude; Latência 1 rodada; Duração Máxima 6 rodadas; Estágio 1 lento 1 (1 rodada); Estágio 2 4d6 dano contundente e lento 1 (1 rodada); Estágio 3 petrificado (1 rodada); Estágio 4 petrificado permanentemente

Ativação A Interagir

(Tradução não oficial - Age of Ashes livro 5)

Gourd Home.name: Casa de Cabaça
Gourd Home.description:
Esta cabaça seca parece inteiramente ordinária, possuindo um interior oco e um barbante resistente amarrado ao seu redor para facilitar que seja carregada. Uma inspeção mais atenta revela que a cabaça possui uma forma vagamente assemelhada a uma cabana ou outra habitação similar.

Activate(1 minuto) Interagir; Efeito Você coloca a casa de cabaça no chão (em uma área aberta grande o suficiente para contê-la) e faz com que se expanda formando uma estrutura quadrada de 9 metros de lado com uma porta. O interior da cabaça é um único aposento grande que pode conter 10 criaturas Pequenas ou Médias com conforto moderado.

Activate A Interagir; Frequência uma vez por dia; Requerimentos A casa de cabaça deve estar expandida sobre a terra ou solo. Efeito Ao bater na porta por fora ou por dentro, você faz a casa d e cabaça encolher até o seu tamanho normal e aparentar ser uma cabaça não-mágica no chão. Pelas próximas 8 horas, o interior da casa de cabaça torna-se um espaço extradimensional cujo tamanho parece inalterado para quem estiver dentro dela.

Se alguém do lado de fora pegar ou danificar a cabaça, ou se alguém dentro da casa de cabaça tentar sair, todas as criaturas em seu interior aparecem imediatamente na área ao redor da cabaça, e ela fica inativa por 24 horas.

Goz Mask.description:
Originally designed by a fanatical sect of Gozren priests, goz masks were designed to help navigate the area around the Eye of Abendego. The masks couldn't contend with the might of the storm, but people all around the Mwangi Expanse still use them. These masks are typically made of wood and sport round, exaggerated features.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You ignore concealment caused by fog, smoke, and other obscuring vapors for 1 minute.

Goz Mask (Greater).description:
Originally designed by a fanatical sect of Gozren priests, goz masks were designed to help navigate the area around the Eye of Abendego. The masks couldn't contend with the might of the storm, but people all around the Mwangi Expanse still use them. These masks are typically made of wood and sport round, exaggerated features.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You ignore concealment caused by fog, smoke, and other obscuring vapors for 10 minutes.

Goz Mask (Major).description:
Originally designed by a fanatical sect of Gozren priests, goz masks were designed to help navigate the area around the Eye of Abendego. The masks couldn't contend with the might of the storm, but people all around the Mwangi Expanse still use them. These masks are typically made of wood and sport round, exaggerated features.

Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The major goz mask gives you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision} and allows you to ignore all concealment from any environmental effects for 1 hour.

Grail of Twisted Desires.name: Graal dos Desejos Deturpados
Grail of Twisted Desires.description:
Este cálice gasto pelo tempo é feito de lata opaca. Tem uma aparência despretensiosa, exceto pelos anéis de ouro, prata e ébano que circundam sua borda.

Ativação A visualizar; Frequência três vezes por dia; Efeito O cálice é preenchido com um dos três vinhos diferentes de sua escolha, conforme descrito a seguir. O vinho tem a mesma aparência, sabor e cheiro, independentemente do tipo que você escolher e @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detectar Magia} não tem efeito no líquido além de indicar que é mágico.

  • Vinho comum.
  • Vinho que, quando bebido, conjura uma magia @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restauração} de 2º nível no bebedor.
  • Vinho que, quando bebido, conjura uma magia @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Pesadelo} de 4º nível no bebedor.

Se você não for caótico, na primeira vez a cada dia que você ativar o cálice, há uma chance em seis de que o líquido que você conjura seja de um tipo diferente (o MJ deve rolar 1d6 como um teste secreto). Na segunda e na terceira vez que você ativar o cálice no mesmo dia, as chances de isso acontecer aumentam para dois em seis ou três em seis, respectivamente. Se você é caótico, o cálice sempre funciona como planejado.

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 2)

Granny's Hedge Trimmer.description:
Usage Two hands

Granny's hedge trimmer resembles a polearm, with whirring blades attached to the end of a pole. The item can be used as a simple weapon in the polearm group that deals [[/r 1d4[slashing]]] damage.

Grappling Hook.name: Arpéu
Grappling Hook.description: Você pode arremessar um arpéu com uma corda amarrada a ele para facilitar a escalada. Para ancorar um arpéu, faça uma rolagem de ataque com o traço secreto contra uma CD que depende do alvo (normalmente pelo menos CD 20). Em um sucesso, seu arpéu fica firme. Em uma falha crítica, o arpéu aparenta estar firme — mas se solta quando você estiver no meio do caminho.

Grasping Snare.name: Arapuca Restritora
Grasping Snare.description:
Você amarra vinhas e cordas para prender uma criatura no lugar. A primeira criatura a entrar no quadrado deve tentar um salvamento de Reflexos CD 26, com os efeitos a seguir.

Successo Crítico A criatura não é afetada. Successo A criatura sofre –1,5 metros de penalidade de estado na Velocidade dela por 1 minuto ou até Escapar (CD 26). Falha A criatura é imobilizada por 1 rodada, e depois sofre –1,5 metros de penalidade de estado na Velocidade dela por 1 minuto. Ambos os efeitos podem se encerrar antes se ela Escapar (CD 26). Falha Crítica A criatura fica imobilizada por 1 minuto ou até Escapar (CD 26).

Grasping Tree.description:
You rig tree branches, thin strands of bark, or other plant matter to close in on a creature that enters the snare’s square. The first creature to enter the square must attempt a DC 19 Reflex saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success The target takes 1d4 slashing damage. Failure As success, plus the target is flat-footed. Critical Failure The target takes 2d4 slashing damage and is immobilized until it destroys the snare (AC 16, HP 25) or Escapes (DC 19).

Graveroot.name: Raiz do Túmulo
Graveroot.description:
A seiva branca opaca retirada do arbusto raiz do túmulo nubla a mente.

Salvamento Fortitude CD 19;Duração Máxima 4 rodadas; Estágio 1 1d10 de dano de veneno (1 rodada); Estágio 2 1d12 de dano de veneno e estupefato 1 (1 rodada); Estágio 3 2d6 de dano de veneno e estupefato 2 (1 rodada)

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir

Grease Snare.description:
This snare releases a stream of grease that coats the area, making movement difficult and potentially making the target slippery and clumsy. The square with the snare, as well as three adjacent squares you determine when you set the snare, become difficult terrain when a creature triggers the snare. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22] saving throw. A creature can use three Interact actions to wipe away the grease from a single square or from the triggering creature; removing the grease from the triggering creature ends the effects on it.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.

Failure For 1 minute, the creature is clumsy 1 and must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting a Thievery check. If the target rolls a failure at a Thievery check, it gets a critical failure instead. This is a misfortune effect.

Critical Failure As failure, but the effects last for 1 hour instead of 1 minute, and removing the grease from the triggering creature requires a 1-minute activity instead of three Interact actions.

Greataxe.name: Machado Longo
Greataxe.description: Este grande machado de batalha é muito pesado para ser usado com apenas uma mão. Muitos machados longos incorporam duas lâminas frequentemente “barbudas”, com uma forma de gancho para aumentar a força do corte

Greatclub.name: Clava Pesada
Greatclub.description: Enquanto muitas clavas pesadas são intrincadamente esculpidas, outras são pouco mais do que um grande galho de árvore. Estas clavas massivas são pesadas demais para serem usadas com apenas uma mão.

Greatpick.name: Picareta Pesada
Greatpick.description: Esta picareta possui cabo mais longo e cabeça mais ampla do que uma picareta convencional. Ela é pesada demais para ser usada com apenas uma mão.

Greatsword.name: Montante
Greatsword.description: Esta imensa espada de duas mãos é quase tão alta quanto seu usuário. A parte de baixo de sua lâmina frequentemente é cega para permitir que seja segurada para uso em combate próximo. .

Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).name: Poção de Sopro de Dragão Verde (Adulto)
Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult).description:
Este líquido contém o sangue de Dragão Verde. Por 1 hora após beber a mistura, você pode baforar um sopro de Dragão Verde. A potência do sopro depende do tipo de poção, baseada na idade do dragão cujo sangue foi usado para prepará-la. Esta poção possui o traço correspondente ao tipo de dano do sopro.

Exalar o sopro do dragão usa uma única ação. Você cria um cone de 4,5 metros de veneno que causa 6d6 de dano de veneno e cada criatura na área deve tentar um salvamento de Reflexos básico CD 29.

Após usar o sopro, você não pode fazê-lo novamente por 1d4 rodadas.

Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).name: Poção de Sopro de Dragão Verde (Venerável)
Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm).description:
Este líquido contém o sangue de Dragão Verde. Por 1 hora após beber a mistura, você pode baforar um sopro de Dragão Verde. A potência do sopro depende do tipo de poção, baseada na idade do dragão cujo sangue foi usado para prepará-la. Esta poção possui o traço correspondente ao tipo de dano do sopro.

Exalar o sopro do dragão usa uma única ação. Você cria um cone de 4,5 metros de veneno que causa 10d6 de dano de veneno e cada criatura na área deve tentar um salvamento de Reflexos básico CD 37.

Após usar o sopro, você não pode fazê-lo novamente por 1d4 rodadas.

Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).name: Poção de Sopro de Dragão Verde (Jovem)
Green Dragon's Breath Potion (Young).description:
Este líquido contém o sangue de Dragão Verde. Por 1 hora após beber a mistura, você pode baforar um sopro de Dragão Verde. A potência do sopro depende do tipo de poção, baseada na idade do dragão cujo sangue foi usado para prepará-la. Esta poção possui o traço correspondente ao tipo de dano do sopro.

Exalar o sopro do dragão usa uma única ação. Você cria um cone de 4,5 metros de veneno que causa 4d6 de dano de veneno e cada criatura na área deve tentar um salvamento de Reflexos básico CD 23.

Após usar o sopro, você não pode fazê-lo novamente por 1d4 rodadas.

Green Wyrmling Breath Potion.description: This liquid contains blood from a wyrmling green dragon. For 1 hour after you drink it, you can unleash a cloud of poison as a breath weapon. Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. The breath weapon deals [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], and each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23|basic] save. After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Greengut.description:
This watery, mint-green emetic of xulgath design is often carried in a delicate obsidian vial or other fragile container.

In the unfortunate circumstance that a creature has been Swallowed Whole by another creature, the swallowed creature can break open a vial of greengut to immediately induce vomiting.

Activate A Interact

The swallower must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40] save or take [[/r 18d6[poison]]] damage and possibly vomit the contents of its stomach.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and vomits up any and all creatures Swallowed Whole on its next turn (a single action, which also allows it a Fortitude save against the sickened condition), as well as any stones or other objects it swallowed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature takes double damage and is sickened 2.

Grievous.name: Agravante
Grievous.description:
Quando a sua rolagem de ataque com esta arma for um acerto crítico e receber o efeito de especialização de crítico, você recebe um benefício adicional dependendo do grupo da arma.

Arco O teste de Atletismo para puxar o projétil tem CD 20.

Clava Você pode afastar o seu oponente em até 4,5 metros.

Dardo O dano persistente de sangramento base aumenta para 2d6.

Escudo Você pode afastar o alvo até 3 metros.

Espada O alvo fica desprevenido até o final do seu próximo turno.

Faca O alvo sofre –1,5 metros de penalidade de estado na Velocidade enquanto sofrer o dano persistente de sangramento.

Funda O alvo também sofre –3 metros de penalidade de estado na Velocidade por 1 rodada se falhar no salvamento.

Haste Você pode mover o alvo até 3 metros.

Lança A condição desajeitado dura 2 rodadas.

Machado Você pode causar dano a uma terceira criatura, com as mesmas restrições.

Mangual Você move o alvo 1,5 metros. Você não pode movê-lo para longe de você, mas pode movê-lo em outra direção à sua escolha.

Martelo Você também pode afastar o alvo em 1,5 metros.

Picareta O dano extra do efeito de especialização de crítico aumenta para 4 pontos por dado de dano da arma.

Pugilato O alvo sofre –4 de penalidade de circunstância em seu salvamento.

Grim Sandglass.description:
One bulb of this tiny hourglass contains black sand, the other white. After even a few grains pass from one side to the other, it reverses its flow to keep the two sides in equilibrium. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 17.

  • Armor You gain resistance 2 to negative.
  • Weapon After you cast a necromancy spell by Activating the sandglass, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 negative damage until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.V4JoVnOfKze8cRan]{Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.m4WpxepWRV1u1Kcw]{Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}.

Grim Sandglass (Greater).description:
One bulb of this tiny hourglass contains black sand, the other white. After even a few grains pass from one side to the other, it reverses its flow to keep the two sides in equilibrium. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 24.

  • Armor You gain resistance 5 to negative.
  • Weapon After you cast a necromancy spell by Activating the sandglass, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 negative damage until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.JnnyamqQrAEcyI6F]{Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.8kfSF8P4NOh09YvZ]{Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Greater)}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 2nd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}.

Grim Sandglass (Major).description:
One bulb of this tiny hourglass contains black sand, the other white. After even a few grains pass from one side to the other, it reverses its flow to keep the two sides in equilibrium. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 29.

  • Armor You gain resistance 10 to negative.
  • Weapon After you cast a necromancy spell by Activating the sandglass, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d8 negative damage until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.QXJLvL2k3WqlF0SN]{Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Major)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.tcHG8NlsYmHdziko]{Effect: Grim Sandglass - Weapon (Major)}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.eexkxcqnkXazsGfK]{Enervation} or 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration}.

Grim Trophy.name: Troféu Macabro
Grim Trophy.description:
Este talismã é feito de várias formas diferentes, geralmente envolvendo uma parte do corpo de uma criatura humanoide disposta de uma maneira macabra. Quando você ativar o troféu, selecione dois alvos e compare o resultado de seu teste de Intimidação às CDs de ambos.

ActivateF visualizar; Acionamento Você faz um teste de Intimidação para Coagir ou Desmoralizar, mas ainda não efetuou a rolagem; Requerimentos Você é especialista em Intimidação.

Grimoire of Unknown Necessities.description:
The cover of this grimoire is bound in a strange crimson, pebbly leather that a @Check[type:occultism|dc:40] check to Recall Knowledge identifies as the hide of a rare monster from the distant plane of Leng. The grimoire's spine is bound in copper and a spiral of shifting runes slowly swirls across its surface.

Activate 1 envision (arcane, divination)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You're an arcane prepared spellcaster and you have rested but not yet prepared your spells for the day

Effect The grimoire provides you with temporary knowledge of a single spell of the highest level you're capable of casting that you don't already have recorded in it or any of your other spellbooks, chosen by the GM based on their knowledge of the adventure to be particularly useful to you during the upcoming day.

A strange quirk of the tome prevents the spell's knowledge from ever traveling further than your own mind. The granted spell is not only removed from the tome's pages at the start of the next day, but is also removed from any other scroll, spellbook, or grimoire the granted spell is copied into, as well as any other way it might have been learned or copied.

Grinning Pugwampi.name: Pugwampi Zombeteiro
Grinning Pugwampi.description:
Esta estatueta de osso de um gremlin sarcástico desfaz-se em pó quando ativada, concedendo uma fração do infame infortúnio do ser naqueles que você golpear.

AtivaçãoF visualizar; Acionamento Você causa dano a uma criatura Desprevenida com a arma afixada; Efeito A criatura que sofreu dano deve obter sucesso em um salvamento de Vontade CD 33.

Sucesso Crítico A criatura não é afetada.

Sucesso A criatura deve rolar duas vezes e usar o pior resultado na próxima rolagem que realizar

Falha A criatura deve rolar duas vezes e usar o pior resultado em todos os testes que fizer até o fim do próximo turno dela.

Grit.description:
Activate 1 Interact

The save for addiction to grit is @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15|name:Grit Addiction|traits:virulent|showDC:owner], and the addiction has the virulent trait.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15|showDC:owner]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 4 hours

Stage 1 +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks (10 minutes)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.e3RzlURndODzBnMt]{Effect: Grit (Stage 1)}

Stage 2 +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks, -2 item penalty to Perception checks (1 hour)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.4aSqtBgvQr2TI3XT]{Effect: Grit (Stage 2)}

Stage 3 -4 item penalty to Perception checks (1 hour)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.ZV9rtVOD1eDTwcY4]{Effect: Grit (Stage 3)}

Stage 4 as stage 3 (1 hour)

Stage 5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confusion} (1 round)

Stage 6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} (remaining duration)

Grolna.description:
Activate A Interact

This caligni-made, murky-green drug supercharges a creature's olfactory senses at the expense of dulling their mind. Popular throughout the Darklands for its ability to transform normally dull scents and flavors into intense, euphoric experiences, grolna can also be a great aid to trackers who want to follow scent trails, turning ordinary humanoids into effective bloodhounds.

Taking an additional dose of grolna while affected by the effects of stage 1 of a previous dose resets the duration of stage 1 and postpones the onset of stage 2 effects.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:13]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 gain scent (imprecise) 30 feet, gain a +3 item bonus to Survival checks to follow tracks, and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 hour)

Stage 2 stupefied 2 (6 hours)

Growth Gun.description:
A growth gun is a +1 striking hand cannon made from the regenerative flesh of a hydra, troll, or other similar creature. It has an attached flesh sac that slowly replenishes one shot each round and can be loaded like a normal round of ammunition. It fires regenerating gobbets of flesh, bone, or teeth, determined by the damage type selected for its modular trait. A growth gun can be fired underwater, though it's still limited by the selected damage type as normal.

Activate 2 Interact (magical, transmutation)

Frequency once per minute

Effect Make a ranged Strike. On a hit, the creature becomes covered in a mass of flesh that continues to grow on the target for a brief time. The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, after which the growth withers and falls off.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the flesh of a creature with regeneration.

Guardian Shield.description:
A guardian shield is a steel shield engraved with the symbol of a good deity.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You conjure a Medium guardian with the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jQdm301h6e8hIY4U]{Spiritual Guardian} spell, but it carries a shield instead of weapons and can't attack. The guardian appears in an unoccupied space next to an ally of your choice within range and uses the Raise a Shield action, granting that ally a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn or until your ally is no longer adjacent to the spiritual guardian. Each time you Sustain the Activation, the guardian moves to the ally, as long as the ally remains within range, and Raises its Shield, granting its bonus again until the beginning of your next turn or until your ally is no longer adjacent to the spiritual guardian. When the ally receiving the AC bonus takes damage beyond the 10 that's redirected to the guardian, you can use a reaction to have the guardian reduce damage for your ally even more by interposing itself further. When it blocks damage in this way, it reduces the damage your ally takes by an additional 20 (for a total of 30 damage reduced), but Dismisses the guardian, immediately ending the activation.

Hardness HP BT
9 36 18

Guiding Chisel.name: Cinzel Guia
Guiding Chisel.description:
Este cinzel mágico evoca o símbolo sagrado da deusa élfica da arte e da arquitetura, Findeladlara. A função original do Cinzel Guia era servir como chave de portal para o Portal do Crepúsculo, mas conforme o Anel de Alseta evanescia da memória coletiva dos elfos, o cinzel tornou-se conhecido e usado exclusivamente por suas outras habilidades. Eventualmente, emissários élficos o deram aos anões de Saggorak como um gesto de amizade.

Você recebe +3 de bônus de item em testes de Manufatura relacionados à trabalho em pedra. Além disso, você precisa de apenas 1 dia para Manufaturar itens usando o Cinzel Guia em vez de 4 dias, e você quadruplica o desconto que consegue ao gastar dias adicionais Manufaturando itens com o Cinzel Guia. Se não estiver claro que você pode usar o Cinzel Guia para Manufaturar um item, o MJ decide.

Guiding Star.description:
This +1 striking returning starknife is made of dark blue metal overlaid with smoky flecks of fused quartz. When you Cast an evocation Spell, your next attack this turn with this starknife reduces the target's cover, changing greater cover to standard cover or ignoring standard and lesser cover.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You successfully Strike a creature with a thrown Strike with guiding star

Effect Soft light outlines the target. At the beginning of your next turn, the guiding star's blades detach and form into darts of starlight, flying up to 40 feet and striking the target unerringly, collectively dealing [[/r 4[piercing]]] damage and [[/r 1[good]]] damage before re-forming. The piercing damage increases to [[/r 6[piercing]]] damage with a greater striking rune and [[/r 8[piercing]]] damage with a major striking rune.

Guisarme.name: Bisarma
Guisarme.description: : Esta arma de haste ostenta uma lâmina longa e curva, frequentemente de gume único, com um gancho despontando do lado oposto da lâmina, o que permite ao usuário derrubar oponentes à distância. Seu cabo normalmente mede 2,40 metros de comprimento.

Habu's Cudgel.description:
Long associated with a notorious crime boss in Nantambu, this stout +1 striking fearsome club is studded with vicious-looking knobs of obsidian and wrapped in cloth for a better grip. It emits a ghastly groan when swung.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You gesture at a square within 40 feet with Habu's Cudgel. The club causes a frightful wail to unleash from that square and casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} (@Check[type:will|dc:24|name:Habu's Cudgel Fear|traits:enchantment,evocation,emotion,fear,mental,unique]) targeting the creature in that square and all adjacent creatures.

Hag Eye.description:
This item appears to be an ordinary semiprecious stone and is typically mounted on a brooch or ring, but the stone is, in fact, an eyeball. This illusion can be seen through with true seeing or similar magic, and anyone who interacts with the item feels its wet and sticky surface, allowing them to attempt to disbelieve the illusion (DC 19). Many hags claim a hag eye is more effective if plucked from a living, awake creature, but this is likely just a convenient excuse for sadism.

The hag eye produces no direct benefit for the wearer, but allows the hag who created it, or any member of her coven, can peer through the eye using the Seek action. This has no range limit, provided the hag is on the same plane.

Any damage dealt to the eye destroys it. If this happens while a hag is looking through it, the hag is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 hour.

Craft Requirements You must be a hag.

Hail of Arrows Snare.name: Arapuca de Saraivada de Flechas
Hail of Arrows Snare.description: When a creature enters the snare's square, it releases hundreds upon hundreds of carefully prepared arrows, blanketing a 20-foot radius around the snare's square with massive arrow fire that deals [[/r 18d6[piercing]]] damage. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic|traits:piercing] saving throw.

Halberd.name: Alabarda
Halberd.description: Esta arma de haste possui um cabo relativamente curto de 1,5 metros. Em sua ponta fica um cravo longo com uma lâmina de machado anexada.

Halcyon Heart.description:
This shekere features carved prayers barely visible under a fine silk net of colorful beads. The handheld percussion instrument grants a +3 item bonus to Performance checks while playing music with it. In addition, when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Perform} with it, you can make it heard by any number of creatures within 100 miles. You can specify one or more specific creatures, or otherwise describe those who will hear it, such as all humans, or all inhabitants of a village. You can send a message through the music that the targets understand. Demons and creatures connected to demons (such as a creature whose deity is a demon lord or a sorcerer with the demonic bloodline) can't easily understand any messages conveyed in this way, even if you wish to send the message to them. They must attempt a Society check against your Performance DC or against DC 40, whichever is higher. If your Performance DC is higher than DC 40 and you want demons to be able to understand the message, you can choose to use DC 40 instead.

Success They understand the message.

Failure They don't understand the message but are aware there was one.

Critical Failure They don't realize the sound of the halcyon heart contains a message.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Requirements The halcyon heart has its net of beads

Effect You pull the net off the halcyon heart and throw it at a creature within 20 feet, using your attack bonus for a ranged simple weapon. On a hit, the net grows and envelops the creature, which becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes, and on a critical hit, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes. The net also attempts to counteract teleportation effects and planar travel of the creature it's entrapping. The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC is 44, and the net has a counteract level of 9 and a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+38 #Counteract]]{+38}. If the target is a demon or connected to a demon, they must roll twice and take the lower result on all attempts to Escape (this is a misfortune effect), and for counter act checks, the net rolls twice and takes the higher result (this is a fortune effect). You can't Perform with the halcyon heart while it doesn't have its net. So long as the net doesn't contain a creature, you can restore it with a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Destruction If the Gorilla King plays a halcyon heart in front of Angazhan's totem, the gourd decomposes, the net frays, and the beads shatter.

Half Plate.name: Meia Armadura
Half Plate.description: Uma meia armadura consiste da parte superior das placas usadas em uma armadura completa, com placas de aço mais leves ou mais esparsas para os braços e pernas. Isto fornece parte da proteção de uma armadura completa, porém com maior flexibilidade e velocidade. Um conjunto desta armadura vem com uma subcamada de @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zBYEU9E7034ENCmh]{Armadura Acolchoada} e um par de @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Ix2vicchE79d6Cl3]{Manoplas}.

Halfling Sling Staff.name: Cajado-Funda Halfling
Halfling Sling Staff.description: Este cajado termina em uma ponta bifurcada que abriga uma funda. O comprimento do cajado fornece uma excelente alavanca quando usado com as duas mãos para arremessar rochas ou balas da funda.

Hampering Snare.name: Arapuca Impeditiva
Hampering Snare.description: Você organiza arbustos, fios, gosmas grudentas e outros materiais para interferir com os movimentos de uma criatura. O quadrado com esta arapuca, assim como três quadrados adjacentes (para formar uma área quadrada de 3 metros de lado), torna-se terreno difícil quando a primeira criatura entrar no quadrado da arapuca. O terreno difícil afeta imediatamente o movimento da criatura incluindo seu movimento no quadrado acionador, e dura 1d4 rodadas depois que a arapuca for acionada. Uma criatura pode usar uma ação de Interagir para limpar o terreno difícil de um único quadrado antes de entrar nele.

Hand Crossbow.name: Besta de Mão
Hand Crossbow.description: : Às vezes chamada de arco dos becos por ladinos e rufiões, esta pequena besta dispara virotes pequenos que às vezes são usados para inocular venenos no alvo. Ela é pequena o suficiente para ser disparada com uma mão, mas ainda requer as duas mãos para recarregar.

Hand mirror with decorated frame.name: Espelho de Mão com moldura decorada

Hand of the Mage.name: Mão do Mago
Hand of the Mage.description:
Esta mão élfica mumificada fica pendurada de uma corrente dourada, seus dedos retorcidos travados em um padrão peculiar.

Activate D Actions"> visualizar; Efeito Você conjura @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mão Mística}.

Hand-Hewed Face.description:
At the crossroads under a new moon, you traded your face for one that you can mold as though it were clay, sealed with a ribbon worn around your neck to hide the seam. Your true appearance changes to that of a generic member of your ancestry. You can shape your facial features with your hands and thus don't need a disguise kit to Impersonate, and you don't take circumstance penalties to Impersonate someone due to the difference in your facial features. Once per day, from any distance, the entity that holds your bargained contract can change their appearance to match your appearance from before you sealed the contract, or the appearance you are currently using through Impersonate. When they do, your face transforms to your new true appearance, that of a generic member of your ancestry, and you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado 3} by the sudden backlash.

Activate 2 Interact

Requirements You have used Impersonate and molded your face into a different face

Effect You peel your current face from your skin, revealing the true generic appearance from your bargained contract. This allows you to duck out of sight and remove the facial component of your disguise almost immediately, though clothing or other elements might still give you away.

Harmonic Hauberk.description:
Rose gold and copper rings in this +2 resilient chain shirt form a vague bird shape. The jingling links tinkle musically, almost like birdsong. While you wear the armor, effects with the auditory trait must first counteract the harmonic hauberk or they have no effect on you.

The harmonic hauberk attempts to counteract @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} spells cast on you and 4th‑level or higher heightened silence spells the first time the armor enters their area (counteract level 4, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+20 #Counteract]]{+20}). After failing to counteract a silence spell, the armor can't attempt to counteract the same spell again, even if you leave and enter the spell's area multiple times.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Requirements You have a pool of Focus Points and at least one composition spell

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point and immediately use the Focus Point to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.irTdhxTixU9u9YUm]{Lingering Composition}, using your Performance check to determine the effects of the spell, followed by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Inspire Defense}. You can use this activation to cast those spells even if you don't have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.sVjATEo8eqkAosNp]{Lingering Composition} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.sahJHnojXO9eEXVE]{Inspire Defense} feats.

Harpoon Bolt.description:
Ammunition round
