The Whispering Reeds.description:
This hefty tome was compiled centuries ago by an anonymous author who sought to collect all parables, myths, stories, and encounters with the Outer Goddess Nhimbaloth. According to the introduction, the author's original intent was to create a work that foes of the Empty Death could use to fight against her influence, but as one reads through the book, it becomes apparent that the opposite effect has been achieved—by compiling these stories, the author inadvertently generated a work that made it easier for Nhimbaloth to influence the world. Those who venerate the Empty Death seek copies of this book to use as a guide and religious text, while those who don't know better and peruse the book as though it were merely an anthology of stories find themselves unwittingly falling prey to Nhimbaloth's cult or agents of the entity herself. Those who study from The Whispering Reeds for too long are often cursed to rise as ghosts after death— though their existence never lasts for long, as they are inevitably consumed by Nhimbaloth.

If a character understands the dangers of this book, however, moderated use can stall or even prevent such a fate from befalling them. If a character takes special care, they can even potentially use The Whispering Reeds for its original purpose—as a weapon against the cult of Nhimbaloth. Using the text too often or leveraging some of its more powerful effects, however, causes the user to feel an ominous chill. In these cases, the user is exposed to the tome's curse, Empty Death.

The anonymous compiler wanted to produce an enormous print run of The Whispering Reeds, but after the initial run they realized the danger and scuttled those plans, instead attempting to destroy those copies already created. This crusade caught the attention of Nhimbaloth's cult, who swiftly assassinated the compiler. Fewer than two dozen copies of this rare tome are believed to still exist. The book's sinister nature causes all attempts to transcribe it to fail, resulting in bodies of gibberish, nonsense text.

The Whispering Reeds provides several abilities, but you can't activate any of them while you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} unless you are a follower of Nhimbaloth.

Activate 10 minutes (Investigate)

Effect You gain a +2 item bonus to skill checks to Recall Knowledge about Nhimbaloth, her faith, or creatures associated with her (such as incorporeal undead, vampiric mists, wisps, and other incorporeal creatures associated with death). Each time you use this ability after the first in a 24-hour period, you are exposed to the Empty Death.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You read aloud a phrase from the book and target a single incorporeal undead creature within 30 feet. That undead creature takes 5d6 positive damage (@Check[type:will|dc:27|basic] save) as portions of their incorporeal being are consumed in patches of seven equally spaced holes. Each time you use this ability after the first in a 24-hour period, you are exposed to the Empty Death.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You invoke a tale from The Whispering Reeds that parallels the situation, environment, or creatures nearby. Eerie mists and indistinct whispers rise in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] around you, and clusters of seven perfectly spaced divots manifest in the ground, vegetation, and flesh of creatures in the emanation other than yourself and up to three creatures you designate at the time of activation. Creatures afflicted with these divots suffer from agonizing mental anguish in the form of crippling despair and take 4d6 mental damage (@Check[type:will|dc:27|basic] save). The mists, whispers, and strange divots fade away at the end of the round, but any creature that takes mental damage from the effect also takes a -1 penalty to saving throws against effects with the emotion trait for 1 minute. You are exposed to the Empty Death each time you use this ability.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency three times per day

Effect You cast one of the following spells at the lowest level possible (unless otherwise specified): @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair} (one target within 30 feet only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} (3rd), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mkbq9xlAUxHUHyR2]{Paranoia}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer}. You are exposed to the Empty Death each time you use this ability.

Empty Death (curse, necromancy, occult)

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:27|traits:curse,necromancy]

Effect If you activate The Whispering Reeds and are not a worshipper of Nhimbaloth, you become stupefied 2 for 24 hours as your thoughts fill with paranoia that something is watching you from the other side of death. If you die while affected by the Empty Death, you immediately become a chaotic evil ghost. Every 7 days that pass after you become a ghost, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:2]— failure indicates that you are consumed by Nhimbaloth. A creature whose ghost is consumed in this way does not travel to the River of Souls and is utterly annihilated; this creature can only be restored to life via a 10th-level spell effect or ritual like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish}.

Destruction Copies of The Whispering Reeds have no special protections and can be destroyed like any regular book, but doing so exposes the one who destroyed the book to the Empty Death.

Thieves' Tools (Concealable).description:
You need thieves' tools to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{Pick Locks} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable Devices} (of some types) using the Thievery skill. Infiltrator thieves' tools add a +1 item bonus to checks to Pick Locks and Disable Devices.

Smaller and made of stronger materials than most sets of thieves' tools, the items in this kit are much easier to conceal. You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal} these tools.

If your thieves' tools are broken, you can repair them by replacing the lock picks with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TxMFNfkoccirCitP]{Replacement Picks} appropriate to your tools; this doesn't require using the Repair action.

Third Eye.name: Terceiro Olho
Third Eye.description:
Quando investida, esta coroa ornamentada e sua gema incandescente se mesclam em sua cabeça e tomam a forma de uma tatuagem. Isto o concede uma visão extraterrena e permite que você leia auras. Ninguém além de você pode manipular o terceiro olho enquanto ele estiver investido. Seus sentidos elevados e habilidade de sentir auras emocionais concedem +3 de bônus de item em testes de Percepção.

Você continuamente vê auras mágicas, como @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detectar Magia} de 9º nível, exceto que vê a localização de todas as auras a até 9 metros (não apenas da mais forte delas). Se usar uma ação Buscar para estudar uma criatura à sua vista, você pode examinar a aura da vitalidade da criatura, extraindo o conhecimento de todas as condições e aflições que ela possui e uma porcentagem aproximada dos Pontos de Vida restantes dela.

Ativação D Actions"> visualizar, comandar; Frequência uma vez por dia; Efeito Você recebe os efeitos de @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Visão Verdadeira} de 8º nível.

Three Peaked Tree.name: Three Peaked Tree
Three Peaked Tree.description: A recently developed weapon created for an elven champion from Jinin, the three-peaked tree can be used as both a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FJrsDoaIXksVjld9]{Trident} and a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.qRqGIxcadjjxcij3]{Mithral Tree}. A three-peaked tree has a length of silken rope attached to the butt of its haft, allowing it to be quickly retrieved after thrown.

Thresholds of Truth.description:
Zarmavdian's spellbook, Thresholds of Truth, was once a straightforward treatise on arcane and occult lore containing several useful spells. It's been so heavily annotated, however, that the original text is hard to read. It's clear that Zarmavdian wanted to prevent eldritch creatures from manipulating innocent minds, but his spellbook is a treasure trove for those seeking dangerous or inscrutable lore. The bookseller Morlibint currently keeps this book in his collection at Odd Stories.

Thresholds of Truth provides access to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.JBPXisA4IdXI9gVn]{Eldritch Researcher} archetype and contains the following spells:

Cantrips

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mAMEt4FFbdqoRnkN]{Chill Touch}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

1st Level

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.UKsIOWmMx4hSpafl]{Color Spray}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{Unseen Servant}

2nd Level

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{False Life}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Glitterdust}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{Web}

3rd Level

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow}

4th Level

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Clairvoyance}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dARE6VfJ3Uoq5M53]{Daydreamer's Curse}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qJQADktwD0x8kLAy]{Resilient Sphere}

Throwing Knife.name: Faca de Arremesso
Throwing Knife.description: Esta faca leve tem um peso balanceado e otimizado para ser arremessada com precisão à uma distância maior do que uma adaga comum. Embora isso venha com um custo significativo de um gume menos afiado, a eficiência como arma de arremesso compensam a perda.

Thunder Helm.description:
The creator of the original thunder helm tried and failed time and again to craft a reliable, helmet-mounted firearm that enabled hands-free gunplay, but even after resorting to magical enhancements, they were never quite able to realize their vision. The allure of the thunder helm continues to compel certain mindsets in the Mana Wastes, and these items continue to be crafted to this day.

A thunder helm appears as a cylindrical iron helmet adorned with a crown-like display of gun barrels extending out in all directions. A slit in the front allows for limited visibility, while sound is muffled by the inner lining. As long as a creature wears a thunder helm, it takes a -1 circumstance penalty to auditory and visual Perception checks but also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against auditory and visual effects.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The helm's gun barrels swivel and aim randomly, then conjure enough gunpowder and bullets to fire in all directions around you. Every creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] takes [[/r 4d6[piercing]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic]). When determining a creature's resistance or immunity to this damage, use the weaker of the target's resistance or immunity to piercing or bludgeoning.

Thunder Sling.name: Thunder Sling
Thunder Sling.description: Tengu use these specialized slings to fire darts further and with greater force than when thrown by hand. A thunder sling uses darts as ammunition. It can also hurl blowgun darts as ammunition but deals [[/r 1d4[piercing]]] instead of 1d6 when used this way.

Thunder Snare.name: Arapuca de Trovão
Thunder Snare.description:
A arapuca faz um barulho estrondoso quando uma criatura entra em seu quadrado, que pode ser ouvido a até 300 metros de distância. A criatura deve tentar uma jogada de salvamento de Fortitude CD 18.

Sucesso Crítico A criatura não é afetada. Sucesso O alvo fica surdo até o final de seu próximo turno. Falha Como sucesso, o alvo também sofre 1 dano sônico. Falha Crítica Como sucesso, o alvo também sofre 1d4 de dano sônico.

Requerimentos de Manufatura 1 pedra-trovão menor

(Tradução não oficial - Extinction Curse livro 1)

Thunderbird Tuft (Greater).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r 2d4[electricity]]] damage, or [[/r 2d6[electricity]]] damage if the creature is using a metal weapon.

Thunderbird Tuft (Lesser).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 round, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r 1d4[electricity]]] damage, or [[/r 1d6[electricity]]] damage if the creature is using a metal weapon, but the nimbus only lasts 1 round, rather than the full minute.

Thunderbird Tuft (Major).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r 3d4[electricity]]] damage, or [[/r 3d6[electricity]]] damage if the creature is using a metal weapon.

Thunderbird Tuft (Moderate).description:
Activate Cast a Spell (add 1 action)

This carved chunk of amber contains a single tuft of gray feathers, which spark with electricity to create an odd jittery sensation in anyone holding the amber for long. When used as part of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} spell, thunderbird tuft funnels electricity back into the spellcaster in a defensive nimbus. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack takes [[/r 1d4[electricity]]] damage, or [[/r 1d6[electricity]]] damage if the creature is using a metal weapon.

Thundering.name: Trovejante
Thundering.description: Esta arma emite o barulho de um trovão quando acerta, causando 1d6 de dano sônico adicional em um Golpe bem-sucedido. Em um acerto crítico, o alvo deve obter sucesso em um salvamento de Fortitude CD 24 ou fica surdo por 1 minuto (ou 1 hora em uma falha crítica).

Thundering (Greater).name: Trovejante (Maior)
Thundering (Greater).description:
Esta arma emite o barulho de um trovão quando acerta, causando 1d6 de dano sônico adicional em um Golpe bem-sucedido. Em um acerto crítico, o alvo deve obter sucesso em um salvamento de Fortitude CD 34 ou fica surdo por 1 minuto (ou 1 hora em uma falha crítica).

O dano sônico causado por esta arma ignora a resistência a dano sônico do alvo.

Thunderstone (Greater).name: Pedra-Trovão (Maior)
Thunderstone (Greater).description:
Esta pedra explode com um estrondo ensurdecedor quando atinge uma criatura ou superfície dura. Uma pedra-trovão causa o dano sônico e o dano sônico de respingo listados, e cada criatura a até 3 metros do espaço no qual a pedra explodiu deve obter sucesso em uma jogada de salvamento de Fortitude com a CD listada ou fica surda até o final do seu próximo turno. Muitos tipos fornecem bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

Você recebe +2 de bônus de item em rolagens de ataque. A bomba causa 3d4 de dano sônico e 3 de dano sônico de respingo, e a CD é 28.

Thunderstone (Lesser).name: Pedra-Trovão (Menor)
Thunderstone (Lesser).description:
Esta pedra explode com um estrondo ensurdecedor quando atinge uma criatura ou superfície dura. Uma pedra-trovão causa o dano sônico e o dano sônico de respingo listados, e cada criatura a até 3 metros do espaço no qual a pedra explodiu deve obter sucesso em uma jogada de salvamento de Fortitude com a CD listada ou fica surda até o final do seu próximo turno. Muitos tipos fornecem bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

A bomba causa 1d4 de dano sônico e 1 de dano sônico de respingo, e a CD é 17.

Thunderstone (Major).name: Pedra-Trovão (Superior)
Thunderstone (Major).description:
Esta pedra explode com um estrondo ensurdecedor quando atinge uma criatura ou superfície dura. Uma pedra-trovão causa o dano sônico e o dano sônico de respingo listados, e cada criatura a até 3 metros do espaço no qual a pedra explodiu deve obter sucesso em uma jogada de salvamento de Fortitude com a CD listada ou fica surda até o final do seu próximo turno. Muitos tipos fornecem bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

Você recebe +, de bônus de item em rolagens de ataque. A bomba causa 1d4 de dano sônico e 1 de dano sônico de respingo, e a CD é 36.

Thunderstone (Moderate).name: Pedra-Trovão (Moderada)
Thunderstone (Moderate).description:
Esta pedra explode com um estrondo ensurdecedor quando atinge uma criatura ou superfície dura. Uma pedra-trovão causa o dano sônico e o dano sônico de respingo listados, e cada criatura a até 3 metros do espaço no qual a pedra explodiu deve obter sucesso em uma jogada de salvamento de Fortitude com a CD listada ou fica surda até o final do seu próximo turno. Muitos tipos fornecem bônus de item em rolagens de ataque.

Você recebe +1 de bônus de item em rolagens de ataque. A bomba causa 2d4 de dano sônico e 2 de dano sônico de respingo, e a CD é 20.

Thurible of Revelation (Greater).name: Turíbulo da Revelação (Maior)
Thurible of Revelation (Greater).description:
Este incensário de latão se pendura em uma corrente. A maioria dos turíbulos da revelação são adornados com textos espiralados escritos em celestial, embora alguns sejam de ferro e contenham textos em abissal ou infernal.

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir; Custo incenso no valor de 5 po; Efeito Você acende o incenso dentro do incensário e ele queima por 1 hora. Durante esse período, enquanto estiver segurando o turíbulo, você recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Religião e trata quaisquer falhas críticas que rolar quando Decifrar Escrita de natureza religiosa como uma falha.

O turíbulo concede +3 de bônus. A versão maior compartilha a revelação aprimorada usada uma vez por dia da versão moderada, exceto que olhar através da fumaça também concede os efeitos de visão verdadeira

Thurible of Revelation (Lesser).name: Turíbulo da Revelação (Menor)
Thurible of Revelation (Lesser).description:
Este incensário de latão se pendura em uma corrente. A maioria dos turíbulos da revelação são adornados com textos espiralados escritos em celestial, embora alguns sejam de ferro e contenham textos em abissal ou infernal.

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir; Custo incenso no valor de 5 po; Efeito Você acende o incenso dentro do incensário e ele queima por 1 hora. Durante esse período, enquanto estiver segurando o turíbulo, você recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Religião e trata quaisquer falhas críticas que rolar quando Decifrar Escrita de natureza religiosa como uma falha.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.lO95TwgihBdTilAB]{Effect: Thurible of Revelation}

Thurible of Revelation (Moderate).name: Turíbulo da Revelação (Moderado)
Thurible of Revelation (Moderate).description:
Este incensário de latão se pendura em uma corrente. A maioria dos turíbulos da revelação são adornados com textos espiralados escritos em celestial, embora alguns sejam de ferro e contenham textos em abissal ou infernal.

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir; Custo incenso no valor de 5 po; Efeito Você acende o incenso dentro do incensário e ele queima por 1 hora. Durante esse período, enquanto estiver segurando o turíbulo, você recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Religião e trata quaisquer falhas críticas que rolar quando Decifrar Escrita de natureza religiosa como uma falha.

O turíbulo concede +2 de bônus. Uma vez por dia, quando ativar o turíbulo, você pode aumentar suas revelações. Durante a ativação, você pode segurar o turíbulo na altura dos seus olhos com uma ação de Interagir e receber os efeitos de ver invisibilidade por 1 rodada ao olhar através da fumaça.

Tidal Fishhook.description:
This +2 greater striking returning @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.3T3ayvgw9HDn05Mz]{Combat Grapnel} takes the form of a fishhook made of scavenged bones and stone with a cord of braided water. Attacks with a tidal fishhook don't take any of the normal penalties for fighting underwater. A broken (but not destroyed) tidal fishhook can be fully repaired by submerging it in an ocean for 1 minute.

Activation 2 Interact (teleportation, water)

Frequency once per hour

Effect A tidal fishhook can travel between bodies of water to strike distant foes. You throw the fishhook into a 5-foot square that's fully covered with water, and it emerges to Strike or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a target from another such square within 60 feet; the squares can be part of the same body of water or different ones. The distance between the bodies of water doesn't count toward the fishhook's range increment. If you successfully Grapple the target as part of this Strike, you can pull yourself along the fishhook's line, teleporting to the secondary body of water.

Tiger Menuki.name: Menuki de Tigre
Tiger Menuki.description:
Este tigre feito de estanho rosna ferozmente do punho de sua arma. Quando você ativar o tigre, a arma afixada adquire o traço amplitude no ataque acionador e em todos os outros ataques por 1 minuto.

AtivaçãoF ee Action" /> visualizar; Acionamento Você Golpeia com a arma afixada.

Tiger's Claw.description:
This +2 striking fearsome dueling pistol is made from fine tigerwood, with the head of a tiger as the muzzle. Beneath the tiger head is a claw shaped bayonet. One of a set of four guns crafted as a gift to a Zenj family for delivery of rare healing and disease- abating herbs during an outbreak of a deadly disease in the Grand Duchy of Alkenstar, these firearms are now passed down to those who have done brave acts in service to the Zenj people. The flintlock sparks thrown by this weapon take the shape of pouncing tigers and the firearm's report sounds like a tiger's growl. Clever wielders use the firearm's report to panic their prey into mistakes and then pounce for the kill.

This firearm's bullets deal slashing damage instead of piercing and add an additional [[/r 1d6[bleed]]] on a critical hit. This persistent bleed damage causes tiger-claw-shaped wounds to appear on the target.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You capitalize on the fears your firearm engenders, terrifying your foes. Make a ranged Strike with this firearm against a target. If you successfully deal damage to your target, the target is also affected by a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{Phantasmal Killer} with a spell DC of 28 (@Check[type:will|dc:28|showDC:all]). While phantasmal killer typically takes the shape of the target's worst fear, this effect always appears to the target in the form of a majestic and ferocious tiger.

Timeless Salts.description:
Activate 1 Interact

You sprinkle these salts onto a single object up to 10 cubic feet in volume and no more than 40 Bulk to preserve it for 1 week. The object doesn't decay, and effects that require the object to be fresh don't count the time passing during this duration as having elapsed. When sprinkled on a corpse, this extends the period in which a creature can be revived by magic, as well as the wait time required before a corpse can be targeted again with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{Talking Corpse}. The salts prevent ordinary pests from consuming the target (such as maggots for a corpse or moths for a piece of clothing). Any creature can use an Interact action to disperse the salts from an unattended object and end this effect.

Tin Cobra.description:
This clockwork cobra activates when a creature enters its square, at which point it lashes out and spits venom, dealing [[/r 3d6[poison]]] damage. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|traits:poison] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 2.

Titan's Grasp.description:
These bronze gauntlets each have a small red gem embedded in the wrist. You gain a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks and a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Grapple. If you successfully Grapple an enemy that's at least one size category larger than you, the gauntlets dig into it, dealing bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier, plus an additional [[/r 2d6[bludgeoning]]] damage on a critical success.

When you invest the gloves, you either increase your Strength score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

Activate 1 Interact (sonic)

Frequency once per day

Requirements You have two hands free

Effect You clap the gauntlets together with a thunderous crack that deals [[/r 6d10[sonic]]] damage in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Titan's Grasp Sonic Clap|traits:sonic|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is deafened for 1 minute, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Atordoado 1}.

Tlil Mask.description:
Colorful, beaded tlil masks are commonly found on the distant continent of Arcadia, but trade between the two regions means that they can also be found in the Mwangi Expanse as curiosities. These masks usually bear floral patterns and attune your senses to plants of all varieties.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your vision up to 60 feet sees through small amounts of living plant matter as though it were transparent. While this effect is active, creatures can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you due to living plants, such as small trees, vines, and grass. This also prevents them from Hiding or Sneaking past you using only living plants for concealment or cover. Other than the inability to use the cover to Hide or Sneak, this ability doesn't prevent plants from providing cover to creatures or blocking line of effect. It also doesn't allow you to see through dead plant matter, such as the wooden walls of a building, or thick plant matter, such as the walls of a dungeon built entirely inside an enormous living tree. The effect lasts for 1 minute.

Tlil Mask (Greater).description:
Colorful, beaded till masks are commonly found on the distant continent of Arcadia, but trade between the two regions means that they can also be found in the Mwangi Expanse as curiosities. These masks usually bear floral patterns and attune your senses to plants of all varieties.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect Your vision up to 60 feet sees through small amounts of living plant matter as though it were transparent. While this effect is active, creatures can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you due to living plants, such as small trees, vines, and grass. This also prevents them from Hiding or Sneaking past you using only living plants for concealment or cover. Other than the inability to use the cover to Hide or Sneak, this ability doesn't prevent plants from providing cover to creatures or blocking line of effect. It also doesn't allow you to see through dead plant matter, such as the wooden walls of a building, or thick plant matter, such as the walls of a dungeon built entirely inside an enormous living tree. The effect lasts for 10 minutes.

Toad Tears.description:
Toad tears can be mixed with any other foodstuff or drink, but the poison can also be ingested as is. The process of refining giant toad poison lessens its deadly qualities, and as a result, toad tears are rarely directly fatal. Yet those who are exposed to toad tears often lose control of their actions, making it a dangerous poison nevertheless.

Saving Throw DC 19 Fortitude; Onset 5 minutes; Maximum Duration 30 minutes; Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}  (10 minutes); Stage 2 stupefied 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 minute) Activate A Interact

Toadskin Salve.description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 10 minutes, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing [[/r 1d4[persistent,poison]]].

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 3 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Toadskin Salve (Greater).description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 10 minutes, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing [[/r 2d4[persistent,poison]]].

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 5 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Toadskin Salve (Major).description:
This thick, oily salve reacts with the air to exude a toxic mucus when applied to skin. Once it's applied, you can activate the salve in one of the two ways detailed below. After either reaction has been used, the remaining mucus loses its reactive properties and falls away as the effect ends. You can only have one dose applied at a time. If you don't use either reaction, after 1 hour, the mucus flakes away and the effect ends.

Activate r Interact

Trigger You hit a creature with a melee Strike

Effect You fling mucus on the creature, dealing [[/r 3d4[persistent,poison]]].

Activate r Interact

Trigger You are hit with a melee attack that deals physical damage

Effect The mucus dulls the blow, granting you resistance 8 to physical damage against the triggering attack.

Topology Protoplasm.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This slimy gel wriggles to the touch, as if covered by a multitude of imperceptible cilia. If applied to a creature or object no larger than 7 feet in any dimension, the protoplasm shifts it into an ooze-like state for 1 minute, allowing the subject to squash and stretch harmlessly. In this state, a creature that attempts a check to Squeeze uses the outcome one degree of success better than it rolls and can move its full Speed while Squeezing, and an object can fit through a space 2 feet across. One vial can cover a creature or object of up to Large size, but as each vial is made from a specific ooze, multiple vials can't be combined together to cover a larger object, as the two gels simply negate each other.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.vZPyQAt5T2L0Dfmq]{Effect: Topology Protoplasm}

Torag's Silver Anvil.name: Bigorna de Prata de Torag
Torag's Silver Anvil.description:
Esta bigorna portátil de prata tem um arco estreito em uma extremidade, através do qual uma longa e resistente corrente foi amarrada. A Bigorna de Prata de Torag pode ser empunhada como um martelo meteoro de prata sagrado maior flamejante maior impactante +3. Fora do combate, a bigorna pode ser usada com um martelo como uma forja portátil incrivelmente eficaz, aquecendo o metal a ser forjado sem uma fornalha e concedendo um bônus de item de +3 para testes de Manufatura envolvendo metalurgia. Quando você usa a bigorna para Reparar com sucesso um item de metal, o item recupera 10 pontos de vida adicionais (ou 20 adicionais em um sucesso crítico).

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Gods and Magic)

Torch.name: Tocha
Torch.description: Uma tocha emana luz brilhante em um raio de 6 metros (e luz fraca por mais 6 metros). Ela pode ser usada como uma arma improvisada que causa 1d4 de dano contundente mais 1 de dano de fogo.

Torrent Snare.description:
You pile waterlogged plants or access a nearby source of water to rain down on a Medium or smaller creature that enters the snare’s square. When a creature enters the square, the snare’s square and all adjacent squares become slippery difficult terrain, and the triggering creature must attempt a DC 19 Reflex saving throw, with the following effects.

Success The target is unaffected. Failure The target falls prone. Critical Failure The target falls prone and is forced into one of the other squares soaked by the snare.

Tower Shield.name: Escudo de corpo
Tower Shield.description:
Estes escudos massivos podem ser usados para fornecer cobertura para o corpo quase inteiro. Devido ao seu tamanho, eles normalmente são feitos de madeira reforçada com metal.. CA aumenta em +4 se você estiver usando a ação Tomar Cobertura.

Dureza PV LQ
5 20 10

Towering sculpture by a master.name: Escultura Imponente feita por um Mestre

Tracker's Goggles.name: Óculos de Rastreador
Tracker's Goggles.description: Estas lentes de vidro verde-floresta são ligadas por couro resistente costurado com barbante rústico. Enquanto usar estes óculos, você recebe +1 de bônus em testes de Sobrevivência para Intuir Direção e Rastrear. Se falhar no teste de Rastrear, você pode tentar novamente após 30 minutos (em vez de após uma hora).

Tracker's Goggles (Greater).name: Óculos de Rastreador (Maior)
Tracker's Goggles (Greater).description: Estas lentes de vidro verde-floresta são ligadas por couro resistente costurado com barbante rústico. Enquanto usar estes óculos, você recebe +2 de bônus em testes de Sobrevivência para Intuir Direção e Rastrear. Se falhar no teste de Rastrear, você pode tentar novamente após 15 minutos (em vez de após uma hora).

Traveler's Any-Tool.name: Ferramenta Versátil do Viajante
Traveler's Any-Tool.description:
Antes de ser ativado, este item parece ser um bastão de freixo com aço em suas duas pontas.

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir, visualizar; Efeito Você imagina uma ferramenta simples específica e a ferramenta versátil do viajante se transforma nela. (Normalmente você pode escolher uma ferramenta listada no Capítulo 6). Isto transforma a parte de madeira em qualquer cabo e a parte de metal em uma pá, cabeça de martelo ou algo similar, replicando a maioria das ferramentas básicas, mas nada mais complexo. Você pode retornar o item à sua forma de bastão com uma ação de Interagir.

Traveler's Cloak.description: These cloaks are designed to accommodate long treks through various climates. Traveler's cloaks for hot climates might be bleached white and created from lighter materials, while those intended for cold climates are made of thicker materials and have linings intended to retain heat. While wearing a traveler's cloak for the appropriate type of weather, increase the time it takes to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} from temperature effects by 2 hours. A traveler's cloak has no effect at extreme or incredible temperatures.

Trident.name: Tridente
Trident.description: Esta arma parecida com uma lança de três pontas tipicamente possui um cabo de 1,20 metros.

Trinity Geode.description:
The crystal chamber within this split geode is divided into three lobes of equal size. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 17.

  • Armor After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 1 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.
  • Weapon After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.oqwrw6XztVlS9tEG]{Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.WRV0XjiEHdlBpduS]{Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{Scatter Scree}.

Trinity Geode (Greater).description:
The crystal chamber within this split geode is divided into three lobes of equal size. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 24.

  • Armor After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 3 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.
  • Weapon After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d6 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.haywlcUtG6hV1LAy]{Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.p9jROgkqozXB52UJ]{Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Greater)}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{Scatter Scree}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}.

Trinity Geode (Major).description:
The crystal chamber within this split geode is divided into three lobes of equal size. The spell DC of any spell cast by Activating this item is 29.

  • Armor After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, you gain resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine) until the end of your next turn, or double the resistance for a non-cantrip spell.
  • Weapon After you cast an earth spell by Activating the geode, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d8 bludgeoning damage until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.agDVcRyoS4NTHkht]{Effect: Trinity Geode - Armor (Major)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.u7200u7lh40am0jb]{Effect: Trinity Geode - Weapon (Major)}

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zA0jNIBRgLsyTpbm]{Scatter Scree}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.3xD8DYrr8YDVYGg7]{Spike Stones}.

Trip Snare.name: Arapuca de Derrubada
Trip Snare.description:
Você estende um fio para derrubar uma criatura. Uma criatura Média ou menor que entrar no quadrado desta arapuca deve tentar um salvamento de Reflexos CD 20.

Se quiser criar uma arapuca de derrubada para afetar uma criatura maior, você deve criar um conjunto contínuo de arapucas que cubra uma área igual a um dos lados do espaço que a criatura ocupa (e ela precisa entrar na área inteira das arapucas para ativálas). Por exemplo, três arapucas de derrubada em uma linha de 4,5 metros podem derrubar uma criatura Enorme que entrar no corredor onde a linha de arapucas foi armada.

Sucesso Crítico A criatura não é afetada.


SucessoA criatura fica Desprevenida até o início do próximo turno dela.


Falha A criatura cai prostrada.


Falha Crítica A criatura cai prostrada e sofre 1d6 de dano contundente.

Tripod.description: Tripods are designed for use with kickback weapons, as a way for gunslingers with lower strength to accurately use these more powerful weapons by sacrificing mobility instead. They can be set up and attached to a firearm with a single Interact action using one hand, setting the tripod in your square. While this sturdy piece of engineering is in use, you don't take the -2 penalty for firing a kickback weapon, even if your Strength isn't high enough to avoid the penalty. However, you must retrieve the tripod with a single Interact action before you can move the firearm to a different position. Normally, when you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, you become observed if you do anything except @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, or Step. However, deploying or retrieving a tripod with an Interact action doesn't automatically make you observed, so long as you don't set up or remove the tripod when it's in a spot where creatures can see the tripod itself.

Triton's Conch.name: Concha do Tritão
Triton's Conch.description:
Se colocar esta grande concha opalescente em sua orelha, você pode ouvir o barulho do mar revolto batendo na costa.

Ativação A Interagir (auditivo); Efeito Você pode erguer a concha até seus lábios para assoprá-la, emitindo uma nota longa e ressonante. Pelo próximo minuto, você e todos seus aliados que estavam a até 9 metros quando a concha foi ativada recebem +2 de bônus de item em testes de Atletismo para Nadar e se tornam capazes de respirar embaixo d’água.

Truesight Potion.name: Poção de Visão Verdadeira
Truesight Potion.description: Ao beber esta poção clara e refrescante, você pode ver as coisas como realmente são. Você recebe os benefícios da magia visão verdadeira de 7º nível que possui modificador de neutralização +25.

Truth Potion.name: Poção da Verdade
Truth Potion.description:
Por 10 minutos após beber esta poção adstringente, você não pode mentir intencionalmente e pode ser compelido a dizer a verdade. Ao beber a poção, tente um salvamento de Vontade CD 19. Você pode falhar ou falhar criticamente de forma voluntária.

Sucesso A poção não o afeta.

Falha Quando fala, você deve falar a verdade.

Falha Crítica Como falha, e quando alguém perguntar alguma coisa, você deve fazer outro salvamento de Vontade CD 19. Se falhar nesta jogada, você deve responder a pergunta com a verdade se for capaz; se obtiver sucesso, você fica temporariamente imune a tentativas adicionais de perguntar a mesma coisa pela duração da poção.

Tteokguk of Time Advancement.description:
Dumplings and rice cakes float invitingly between seaweed and egg in this comforting soup. While normal tteokguk helps you gain an extra year of age when you eat it, the magic in tteokguk of time advancement takes this a step further.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect Upon eating the tteokguk, you gain several years of age, morphing into an older version of yourself. Your physical appearance and personality change to those you would have at any age older than your current one. This grants you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to pass as the chosen age, and you can add your level as a proficiency bonus to these checks even if you're untrained. Furthermore, unless a creature specifically uses a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action or otherwise carefully examines you, it doesn't get a chance to notice that you aren't at your true age. This lasts until morning of the next day, at which point you are temporarily immune until the next lunar new year.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.M0hhLRC86sASVOk7]{Effect: Tteokguk of Time Advancement}

Tusk and Fang Chain.description:
Usage affixed to armor

Activate f command

Trigger You Grab or restrain a creature or become grabbed or restrained by a creature

This length of silver chain has a tiger's fang on one end and the tip of a dire boar's tusk on the other. When you activate the chain, an ephemeral chain encircles the target creature's head and a cacophony of animal sounds clouds its mind. It must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:35|showDC:owner] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} on its next action.

Failure The creature is confused for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is confused for 1 minute and the creature doesn't receive a flat check to end its confusion if it takes damage. At the end of each of its turns, it attempts a new Will save, ending the effect on a success.

Twining Chains.description:
This set of chains is completely covered with spikes and sharp blades. Not balanced for weapon use, twining chains are instead wrapped around a user's body as a deterrent to attackers-and, for some, a fashion statement. While wearing twining chains, you gain the Thorns reaction. In addition to their dangers, twining chains' weight also increases your armor's Bulk by 1, Strength entry value by 2, and check penalty by 2.

Thorns r

Trigger You are hit by an unarmed attack

Effect You twist to harm your attacker with your chains' spikes and blades. Make an attack roll against the triggering attacker using your unarmed attack modifier. On a hit, the attacking creature takes [[/r 1d6[piercing]]] damage. This damage increases to [[/r 2d6[piercing]]] damage if the armor has a +1 potency rune, [[/r 3d6[piercing]]] damage if the armor has a +2 potency rune, or [[/r 4d6[piercing]]] damage if the armor has a +3 potency rune. However, whether you hit or miss, you take piercing damage equal to the number of d6s of piercing damage you would deal your attacker.

Twining Staff.name: Cajado de Ramos Entrelaçados
Twining Staff.description:
Aparentando ser apenas um pequeno disco plano feito de ramos, este item pode crescer ou encolher

Ativação A Interagir; Efeito Você faz os ramos crescerem ou contraírem rapidamente, moldando-os em um cajado +1 impactante, em um bo +1 impactante ou em sua forma de disco. Em sua forma de disco, ele possui Volume desprezível e deve ser segurado em uma mão para ser ativado. Em outras formas, ele possui o mesmo Volume que uma arma normal do seu tipo. Você pode trocar sua empunhadura como parte da ativação.

Quando expandir o item, você pode usar a força da expansão para dar um Salto em Altura ou para tentar Forçar uma porta ou algo semelhante ao encaixar o disco em uma lacuna antes da ativação. O cajado faz um teste de Atletismo com +15 de modificador.

Umbral Wings.description:
This hooded cloak is soft and surprisingly durable. Its cloth is a purple so deep as to be almost black, woven with dark blue and purple shapes suggesting wings of nocturnal creatures. While wearing the cloak, you gain low-light vision and a +1 item bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} creatures.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per hour

Effect You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed until the end of your next turn. If you aren't standing on solid ground when the effect ends, you fall.

Unending Youth.description:
You cease aging, and if you were older than young adult in age, you become a young adult again. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against death effects and resistance to negative damage equal to half your level.

Once per day, from any distance, Abrogail Thrune II can recite a mandatory appearance clause in your Thrune contract as a 3-action activity to summon you to her side, where you are controlled by Abrogail for 1 minute before you return.

Activate 2 Command

Frequency once per day

Effect You recite a hold harmless provision from your Thrune contract. Reduce your doomed value to 0. Abrogail Thrune II is immediately made aware that you have used this ability.

Unholy.name: Profano
Unholy.description:
Uma runa profana instila poder inferal na arma gravada. Uma arma com esta runa causa 1d6 de dano maligno adicional contra alvos bondosos. Se for bom, você fica enfraquecido 2 enquanto carregar ou empunhar esta arma

Ativação Rion"> comandar; Frequência uma vez por dia; Acionamento Você obtém sucesso crítico em uma rolagem de ataque contra uma criatura bondosa com a arma; Efeito O alvo sofre dano persistente de sangramento

Unholy Water.name: Água Profana
Unholy Water.description:
A malícia de uma divindade maligna habita dentro deste frasco de água. Você ativa um frasco de água profana ao arremessá-lo como um Golpe. Ela é uma arma de arremesso simples com incremento de distância de 6 metros. Diferente de uma bomba alquímica, a água profana não adiciona o traço manuseio ao ataque feito com ela.

Água profana causa 1d6 de dano maligno e 1 de dano maligno de respingo. Ela só causa dano a celestiais e criaturas que possuam fraqueza contra dano maligno.

Ativação A Golpear

Universal Solvent (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Originally formulated as a means of dissolving @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{Soverign Glue}, this powerful solvent can break almost any adhesive's grip. As universal solvent is particularly effective against sovereign glue, it automatically dissolves sovereign glue. It attempts to counteract any other adhesives, such as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bags}, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+19 #Counteract]]{1d20+19}.

Universal Solvent (Major).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Originally formulated as a means of dissolving @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{Soverign Glue}, this powerful solvent can break almost any adhesive's grip. As universal solvent is particularly effective against sovereign glue, it automatically dissolves sovereign glue. It attempts to counteract any other adhesives, such as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bags}, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+28 #Counteract]]{1d20+28}.

Universal Solvent (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Interact

Originally formulated as a means of dissolving @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7IrQPyMm76nLVoXx]{Soverign Glue}, this powerful solvent can break almost any adhesive's grip. As universal solvent is particularly effective against sovereign glue, it automatically dissolves sovereign glue. It attempts to counteract any other adhesives, such as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bags}, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+9]].

Unmemorable Mantle.name: Manto Esquecível
Unmemorable Mantle.description:
Esta capa longa e de baixa qualidade tem um capuz e um fecho simples de latão. Enquanto usa a capa, você ganha +1 de bônus de item nos testes de Dissimulação para Personificar um indivíduo e para Mentir enquanto estiver no personagem como aquele indivíduo.

Ativação 1 minuto (visualizar, Interagir); Frequência uma vez por dia; Requerimentos Você está se Personificando outra pessoa; Efeito Ao conversar ou interagir casualmente com outras criaturas, você pode ajustar o fecho do manto para modificar as lembranças dessas criaturas dos últimos 5 minutos de interação com você. Cada criatura deve tentar um salvamento de Vontade CD 25.

Sucesso Crítico A criatura se lembra da interação com clareza e percebe que você estava tentando alterar a memória dela.

Sucesso A criatura lembra a interação com clareza.

Falha Você decide se a criatura lembra ou não da interação. Você também pode alterar pequenos detalhes que a criatura lembra sobre a interação, como a hora, local e se a interação foi favorável, conforme determinado pelo MJ.

Falha Crítica Você decide se a criatura lembra ou não da interação. Você também pode alterar detalhes importantes que a criatura lembra sobre a interação, como acreditar que você é outro indivíduo ou que a criatura concordou com um favor, conforme determinado pelo MJ.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)

Urumi.name: Urumi
Urumi.description: Um bouquet de lâminas em forma de chicote se estende do cabo desta arma.

Vaccine (Greater).name: Vacina (Maior)
Vaccine (Greater).description:
Ativação 1 Interagir

Uma vacina concede imunidade a uma criatura específica de doença de um nível igual ou menor do que o nível da vacina, e um bônus de item de +2 em todas as jogadas de salvamento contra outras estirpes da mesma doença. Por exemplo, uma vacina poderia conceder imunidade a fev imune infligida por otyughs, mas só concederia um bônus +2 na jogada de salvamento contra a febre imunda infligida por Ratos gigantes.

Requisitos para Criação Criar uma vacina requer uma amostra da doença em questão.

Duração 1 ano.

Vaccine (Lesser).name: Vacina (Menor)
Vaccine (Lesser).description:
Ativação 1 Interagir

Uma vacina concede imunidade a uma criatura específica de doença de um nível igual ou menor do que o nível da vacina, e um bônus de item de +2 em todas as jogadas de salvamento contra outras estirpes da mesma doença. Por exemplo, uma vacina poderia conceder imunidade a Febre imunda infligida por Otyughs, mas só concederia um bônus +2 na jogada de salvamento contra a febre imunda infligida por Ratos gigantes.

Requisitos para Criação Criar uma vacina requer uma amostra da doença em questão.

Duração 24 horas.

Vaccine (Major).name: Vacina (Superior)
Vaccine (Major).description:
Ativação 1 Interagir

Uma vacina concede imunidade a uma criatura específica de doença de um nível igual ou menor do que o nível da vacina, e um bônus de item de +2 em todas as jogadas de salvamento contra outras estirpes da mesma doença. Por exemplo, uma vacina poderia conceder imunidade a fev imune infligida por otyughs, mas só concederia um bônus +2 na jogada de salvamento contra a febre imunda infligida por Ratos gigantes.

Requisitos para Criação Criar uma vacina requer uma amostra da doença em questão.

Duração Permanete.

Vaccine (Minor).name: Vacina (Mínimo)
Vaccine (Minor).description:
Ativação 1 Interagir

Uma vacina concede imunidade a uma criatura específica de doença de um nível igual ou menor do que o nível da vacina, e um bônus de item de +2 em todas as jogadas de salvamento contra outras estirpes da mesma doença. Por exemplo, uma vacina poderia conceder imunidade a Febre imunda infligida por Otyughs, mas só concederia um bônus +2 na jogada de salvamento contra a febre imunda infligida por Ratos gigantes.

Requisitos para Criação Criar uma vacina requer uma amostra da doença em questão.

Duração 1 hora.

Vaccine (Moderate).name: Vacina (moderado)
Vaccine (Moderate).description:
Ativação 1 Interagir

Uma vacina concede imunidade a uma criatura específica de doença de um nível igual ou menor do que o nível da vacina, e um bônus de item de +2 em todas as jogadas de salvamento contra outras estirpes da mesma doença. Por exemplo, uma vacina poderia conceder imunidade a fev imune infligida por otyughs, mas só concederia um bônus +2 na jogada de salvamento contra a febre imunda infligida por Ratos gigantes.

Requisitos para Criação Criar uma vacina requer uma amostra da doença em questão.

Duração 1 semana.

Vampiric Scythe.description:
The blade of this +2 greater striking wounding scythe is sharp enough to produce a whistling sound when swung through the air. The shaft is made of ebony wood with a sickly shine to it, much like the shine of infected wounds and contaminated water.

Activate r command

Trigger An enemy critically succeeds at an attempt to Disarm you

Effect As the scythe leaves your hand, it drinks the triggering creature's blood. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|name:Vampiric Scythe Disarm|traits:uncommon] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} on a critical failure). If the triggering creature becomes drained, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to the triggering creature's level. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Activate r command

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You critically succeed at a Strike against a living opponent

Effect The scythe drains life essence from your opponent into you. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half the slashing damage the scythe dealt to the foe. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Vanishing Coin.name: Moeda Sumidoura
Vanishing Coin.description:
Esta moeda de cobre fica pendurada em uma tira de couro que passa por um furo em seu centro. Até ser ativada, a moeda fica invisível por alguns segundos em intervalos aleatórios. Quando ativar a moeda, ela conjura @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{invisibilidade} de 2º nível em você, durando até o final do seu próximo turno.

AtivaçãoF Visualizar; Acionamento Você faz um teste de Furtividade, mas ainda não efetuou a rolagem; Requerimentos Você é mestre em Furtividade.

Vanishing Wayfinder.name: Bússola Desbravadora do Desaparecimento
Vanishing Wayfinder.description:
A bússola desbravadora do desaparecimento é trabalhada em marfim cravejado de ouro e prata. Ele tem as funções usuais de um bússola desbravadora e a seguinte ativação adicional.

Ativação D Actions"> comandar, Interagir; Frequência uma vez por dia; Efeito Você liga a bússola desbravadora em um círculo enquanto invoca sua palavra de comando, ganhando os efeitos de uma magia de invisibilidade de 2º nível por 5 minutos.

(Tradução não oficial - Lost Omens: Character Guide)

Vapor Sphere.description:
Activate r envision

Trigger You trigger a trap's reaction or an enemy that was undetected by you makes an attack against you

Requirements You're an expert in the affixed armor and an expert in Reflex saves.

Within this strange glass sphere swirls a cloud of smoke that occasionally appears as if it's trying to escape. You react to a surprise encounter with haste, activating this talisman and causing your body to momentarily become like vapor. Against the trap's reaction or the attack, you gain resistance 25 to physical damage and are immune to precision damage. This effect also prevents the reaction or attack from physically moving you (such as falling down a pit or being knocked prone), and after the reaction or attack, you can Fly 5 feet. When you end this flight, you leave your vaporous state and are exposed to any danger still at your location.

Vaultbreaker's Harness.description:
A vaultbreaker's harness has four pockets across the chest. The pockets contain a set of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6nrCxNQFycUVFOV2]{Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator)},@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.BznmPaRjI4Orb0IH]{Thieves' Tools (Infiltrator Picks)}, a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4kz3vhkKPUuXBpxk]{Crowbar (Levered)}, and a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wewWxypLaXcHjJ5P]{Glass Cutter}. These items are magically bound to the harness; if they are more than 1 foot away from you, they disappear, then reappear in the harness at the next sunset. Broken or destroyed items similarly reappear, restored, in their proper pockets at sunset.

Activate1 Interact

Effect You cinch the harness to prepare for mischief. You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.7MgpgF8tOXOiDEwv]{Effect: Vaultbreaker's Harness}

Venomous Cure Fulu.description:
Activate f envision

Trigger You attempt a saving throw against an injected poison.

This green fulu depicts venomous creatures and vermin. When activated, the venom from the fulu fights against the venom in your system, granting you a +2 status bonus to the triggering saving throw.

Ventriloquist's Ring.name: Anel do Ventríloquo
Ventriloquist's Ring.description:
Este elegante anel de cobre possui imagens em miniatura de pássaros canoros gravadas ao longo de sua circunferência. Você recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Dissimulação.

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir; Frequência uma vez por dia; Efeito Girar o anel ao redor do seu dedo permite que você projete sua voz magicamente, como os efeitos de @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism} spell (DC 19).

Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater).name: Anel do Ventríloquo (Maior)
Ventriloquist's Ring (Greater).description:
Este elegante anel de cobre possui imagens em miniatura de pássaros canoros gravadas ao longo de sua circunferência. Você recebe +1 de bônus de item em testes de Dissimulação.

Ativação D Actions"> Interagir; Frequência uma vez por dia; Efeito Girar o anel ao redor do seu dedo permite que você projete sua voz magicamente, como os efeitos de @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{Ventriloquism} spell (DC 27).

Verdant Staff.name: Cajado Verdejante
Verdant Staff.description:
Este galho de carvalho cresce folhas na primavera que mudam de cor no outono e caem no inverno. Enquanto empunhar o cajado, você recebe +2 de bônus de circunstância em testes de Natureza para identificar plantas.

Ativação Conjurar uma Magia; Efeito Você gasta cargas do cajado para conjurar uma magia da lista dele.

Requerimentos de Manufatura Fornecer uma conjuração de todas as magias listadas de todos os níveis listados.

  • Truque Mágico @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{emaranhapé}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{bastão de abrunheiro} (pode afetar o cajado verdejante)
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Aspecto de Árvore}, , @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Emaranhar}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CXICME10TkEJxz0P]{Moldar Madeira} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Pele de Árvore}

Verdant Staff (Greater).name: Cajado Verdejante (Maior)
Verdant Staff (Greater).description:
Este galho de carvalho cresce folhas na primavera que mudam de cor no outono e caem no inverno. Enquanto empunhar o cajado, você recebe +2 de bônus de circunstância em testes de Natureza para identificar plantas.

Ativação Conjurar uma Magia; Efeito Você gasta cargas do cajado para conjurar uma magia da lista dele.

Requerimentos de Manufatura Fornecer uma conjuração de todas as magias listadas de todos os níveis listados.

  • Truques @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Emaranhapé}
  • 1º @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{Bastão de Abrunheiro} (pode afetar o cajado verdejante)
  • 2º @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Aspecto de Árvore},, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Emaranhar}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CXICME10TkEJxz0P]{Moldar Madeira}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Pele de Árvore};
  • 3º @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Muralha de Espinhos}
  • 4º @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Pele de Árvore}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Falar com Plantas}
  • 5º @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Forma de Planta}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Muralha de Espinhos}

Vermin Repellent Agent (Greater).description:
Activate 3 Interact

This specialized cream serves as a repellent to stave off insects.

The repellent also binds with a number of common insect venoms, dulling the potency and giving the wearer's immune system a boost to resist venoms.

Once applied to your skin, the repellent grants you a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 4 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.VrYfR2WuyA15zFhq]{Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Greater)}

In addition, any arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals) must attempt a Will save (DC 29) when attempting to attack you with a melee Strike, or with a swarm attack such as the spider swarm's swarming bites. The arthropod then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can act normally.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 2.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}.

Vermin Repellent Agent (Lesser).description:
Activate 3 Interact

This specialized cream serves as a repellent to stave off insects.

The repellent also binds with a number of common insect venoms, dulling the potency and giving the wearer's immune system a boost to resist venoms.

Once applied to your skin, the repellent grants you a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 4 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.OAN5Fj21PJPhIqRU]{Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Lesser)}

In addition, any arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals) must attempt a Will save (DC 17) when attempting to attack you with a melee Strike, or with a swarm attack such as the spider swarm's swarming bites. The arthropod then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can act normally.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 2.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}.

Vermin Repellent Agent (Major).description:
Activate 3 Interact

This specialized cream serves as a repellent to stave off insects.

The repellent also binds with a number of common insect venoms, dulling the potency and giving the wearer's immune system a boost to resist venoms.

Once applied to your skin, the repellent grants you a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 4 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.e6dXfbKzv5sNr1zh]{Effect: Vermin Repellent Agent (Major)}

In addition, any arthropods (insects, spiders, scorpions, crabs, and similar invertebrate animals) must attempt a Will save (DC 35) when attempting to attack you with a melee Strike, or with a swarm attack such as the spider swarm's swarming bites. The arthropod then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can act normally.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is frightened 2.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}.
